name: Doom
description: The Ultimate Doom, named simply Doom on the service, was released as a download for the Xbox 360 on the Xbox Live Arcade service on September 27, 2006. In September 2010 the game was delisted from the service catalogue however it was subsequently put back on the marketplace.

name: Abyss Protection
description: Abyss Protection - dynamic, endless Tower Defense. Fight off the attacks of the inhabitants of the abyss, expand your possessions. Build formidable weapons that will help repulse enemies. Defeat the main evil.

name: Doom II
description: A remaster of the original Xbox version of Doom II. The Doom II port includes the Xbox bonus level, Betray. However, it is inaccessible.

name: Little Man Has a Day
description: A personal, short and silly handwritten game about a little man feeling a little 'eh'.

name: Pizza Connection Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega City Police: Digital Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nayla's Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Under the Hood
description: Sin descripción

name: Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil
description: A standalone release of the expansion Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil. It includes the main game, the expansion, The Ultimate Doom (Xbox port, with its extra stage), Doom II (Xbox port, with its extra stage) and Master Levels for Doom II.

name: Doom 3
description:
The 2004-era Doom 3 with enhanced graphics, a checkpoint save system, 3D Capability for 3D Televisions and Achievements/Trophies (Xbox 360, Steam, and PS3).

Unlike the original game which featured the Flashlight as a 'weapon' itself, the BFG Edition instead was 'armor-mounted' meaning players can attack and illuminate dark areas simultaneously.

It was released inside Doom 3: BFG Edition.

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Shadows
description:
Digital Shadows is the first expansion for Mato Anomalies giving you the opportunity to dive deeper into the game's rich narrative. But this time, from ""the other side"".
Take control of Gram's android companion SkyEye and team up with Mist to explore the virtual dimension of Mato and free it from the digital threats lurking in the dark web.

name: M.E.R.C. Genesis
description: Get ready to experience high-octane Sci-Fi horror with "M.E.R.C Genesis". Embark on a journey that pushes the boundaries of fear, survival, and discovery. Can you withstand the darkness that awaits?

name: Evelone Wrath
description: You are Evelone192, the founder of the Freak Squad. Your friends are captured and held hostage by your sworn enemies - members of an "Anti-Freak Squad". Can you save Buster and Lixxx?

name: Outlanders: Life of Yolotli
description: Deep within the dense jungle lands of the Outlands, a girl is born. As she grows up in a world of power-hungry leaders and reckless habits, she will learn valuable lessons about the intricate cycle of life and nature, the cost of unrestrained ambition, and, most importantly, herself.

name: Anonymous;Code: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition Contents
- Game - Anonymous;Code
- Interactive Digital Art Book - A Beginner's Guide to Earth Simulator
- Full Digital Soundtrack with 52 songs - Sound Data Log

name: Cooking Arena: Food Truck Tycoon Asian Cuisine
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand-new food truck!

Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Cooking Arena: Sweet Bakery Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits and decorations.

Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

name: Cooking Arena: Burger Chef Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to explore burger joint from the other side!
Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity!

Manage the preparation of burgers, french fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up!

name: Cooking Arena: Pizza Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to work in this pizzeria which will soon become the best one in town!

Well... at least that's your plan.

The clients are already standing in line, and you have to serve them as soon as you can. It's harder than it sounds though!

name: Cooking Arena: Pancake Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to work in this pancake bar which will soon become the best one in town!

Scoop up some pancake batter and drizzle it on a frying pan. Watch as it turns golden brown.

Add some ingredients – syrup, fruit, whipping cream... Don't forget a thing!

name: Cooking Arena: Sushi Time!
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to manage a sushi bar!

Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up!

Upgrade your bar and beautify it, so that you'll be able to create the best sushi in town!

name: Cooking Arena: Salad Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
You will be able to manage this awesome salad bar which will soon become the best one in town!

Be careful not to mix up your recipes!

Upgrade your bar and make it beautiful! Find ingredients of the best quality!

name: Cooking Arena: Breakfast Bar Tycoon
description:
In this DLC for Cooking Arena:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!

You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.

name: Chrome Wolf
description: Enjoy tank fights in a tale of fleeting memories and the lives of freedom fighters!

name: World Spin
description: Simple and satisfying! Unwind your mind with this new brain training puzzle action game!

name: Brain On: Dot Physics
description: Get your Brain On and work out the physics puzzles

name: Fun Chess: Ultimate Edition
description:
Pick your favorite

Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

Hone your skills

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Special Edition
description:
Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure YOU are the last one standing.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 45 new levels to explore
• 8 new Achievements to complete
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes eleven colors for your fly rod and your fishing net.

name: Technobabylon: Birthright
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes two new characters - an adorable dragon and a super-sweet red panda.

name: Fun Chess
description: Sin descripción

name: Out of Hand
description: Shoot, explode, push or slash your friends in this out of hand game. Join 2-8 players who've all lost their arms in a tragic accident to be the last one standing. Now it's up to you to use your makeshift mechanical arm and the items at hand to eliminate your former friends.

name: Bus Simulator: Original
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Warriors
description: Stickman Warriors - fun and addictive beat'em'up game with realistic physics and hardcore gameplay. With simple controls you can perform amazing stunts and blows to defeat your opponents.

name: Plant Chess
description: Plant the seeds of victory! Fill the board with plants, while your opponent does the same as they clash. The more plants, the more fun, complex, and intense the tactics get. Watch out and don't get ninja'd! Rush, control, turtle, econ, or something weird and unexpected - how will you plant?

name: Deadshot
description: Deadshot is a retro styled first person shooter inspired from classics like Half Life, Doom, Quake and many alike.

name: FNaF Multiplayer: Forgotten Pizzeria
description: A free-to-play multiplayer game where the action takes place at night, in the insanely big, randomly generated Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Players are randomly placed in one of the two available roles: nightguards and animatronics. Guards rush to find tools to complete maintenance work while the animatronics hunt them down with their special abilities.

name: Pulse Codex EP
description: Decode the control glyph and challenge strange entities in a short audiovisual composition / videogame hybrid.

name: World Football 98
description:
World Football 98 is a soccer game, released just before the 1998 Football World Cup.

It featured Kiko Narváez, the Spanish national team striker, prominently in the Kiko World Football version. The game was also later distributed as a gift when buying Danone yogurts under the name of Danone World Football where it was an ad game, as in the break between halves advertisements are shown.

name: The Last Sight
description: You started a neighborhood security program, which gradually expanded in size. Over time, it evolved to monitor not only homes but also warehouses, gas stations and various other locations. However, as your program grew, it began attracting the attention of dubious individuals.

name: EviscerateThisGirl.com
description:
The website you spend a bit too much time on...

Horror game made for the Neo Twiny Jam, with less than 500 words. About 10 minutes long. No jumpscares.

name: Meta
description:
A parody of amateur adventure design, this metagame consists of a simple treasure hunting game, and a complex editor needed to complete it. The editor and its assistant Cuppit are all part of the game; anyone involved in game or level design should appreciate the humor.

The editor is an exercise of twisted logic and lateral thinking. You have to see it to believe it; with its offbeat controls, inventory items that kill you, and intentional misspellings, it's the weirdest thing since sliced bread!

META is based on Adventure Game Studio, the platform for most of our games, and is runner-up for two AGS Awards.

name: Submachine 5: The Root
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Filling Up
description: Luna and Rezzy are on a roadtrip, and need to get gas. Things escalate from there.

name: Girls Will Bite
description: A girl eats another girl out.

name: Cala a Boca, Galvão!
description: Cala a Boca, Galvão! is a whac-a-mole game based on the internet phenomena of the same name, where you "shut up" the Brazilian sports narrator Galvão Bueno by adding tape in his mouth.

name: Themm: Harukanaru Meikyuu
description: Long time ago, human beings believed in gods. But time has passed, and the humans stopped worshipping them. The gods got angry. The world plunged into chaos. Demons who looked like pretty girls have appeared, driving people insane. Five kings have sent brave heroes to find a magical stone that alone could restore peace to the world. One of these heroes is Lucido. Aided by a simple village girl, he bravely descends into a dungeon full of seductive monsters - but he should beware of the competition...

name: Citadel Remonstered
description:
An updated version of Citadel by Pawel Matusz and Artur Bardowski of the original development team with help from Adam Nowakowski.

This enhanced version removes some bugs discovered over 20 years and improves some aspects of the gameplay such as performance, player control, and an update of the in-game graphics and level design.

name: Home Computer Heroes Collection 1
description: Home Computer Heroes Collection 1 for Evercade brings the Indie Heroes philosophy to the home computer space! Enjoy seven "modern retro" titles designed for classic home computers on Evercade, including Planet X2 and Attack of the PETSCII Robots by The 8-Bit Guy, the official C64 version of the beloved Farming Simulator series, our first MSX title, The Sword of Ianna, plus Tanks Furry and Bridge Strike from Amiga demoscene veterans Project R3D.

name: Rockfish
description:
Rockfish is an unfinished iOS game that was being developed by Studio Pixel, the creator of Cave Story. Having started development in 2010, the game originally focused on a rockfish, who is contacted by a mermaid that has been imprisoned in an amulet. She asks the fish to collect the pieces of the shattered amulet in order to free her.

By the end of 2011, development was paused and the game's concept was retooled. This rebooted version of the game featured a man in a submarine as the protagonist. This version was being worked on until the end of 2012, after which the project was scrapped in favor of Kero Blaster.

In 2023, Pixel released a previously unreleased demo for Rockfish, dated November 27, 2011.

name: A Message For The Stone King
description:
You have a gravely important message to deliver to your leader, the powerful and legendary Stone King, about an enemy army approaching the kingdom's borders. However, after many years of firm, decisive leadership and uncontested rule it will be difficult to make him hear you.

Dig your way out of the dungeon and try to find out why the king won't believe a word you say.

name: Full Void: Special Edition
description:
Complete with the included comic from the standard edition, this Special Edition also includes an exclusive blue coloured cartridge, stickers, poster, an exclusive cart inlay and an art book, all in one cardboard sleeve.

Full Void by OutOfTheBit is a modern indie title for Evercade, heavily inspired by classic 16-bit cinematic puzzle platformers. Taking on the role of a nameless teenager in a futuristic dystopia, you must fight back against the rogue AI that has enslaved humanity!

name: The Anglerfish Project
description: Use your friendly probe, Paul, to fish for communication packages in the cosmos. Aim at an alteration in the sky and, being careful of your strength, cast your fishing rod. You will need to decrypt these hidden messages to help keep everyone safe. Good luck, angler.

name: Kitten Milk Replacer
description:
Those brave women of legends, Long defeated, but still clinging to her sacred vows:
Whereas others scoff at her with "it's not MY responsibility", she dares to rebuke them:

"Well, what does that matter?"
Needless to say, they bear a terrible curse.
...Can that girl really free us from our suffering?

name: Ultraman Club: Teki Kaijuu wo Hakken se yo!
description: Ultraman Club: Teki Kaijuu o Hakken Seyo is a 1990 Game Boy game and the third in the Ultraman Club series.

name: Dino Run
description:
Roarrr! Welcome to the epic world of "Dino Run", where an unruly dinosaur is on the loose and won't stop for anything or anyone. Join our hilarious dino as he races through a prehistoric playground, dodging walls, fences and even crossing bridges like a boss!

You must watch out for those tricky corners! Make sure you turn correctly or face extinction! And what's more fun than demolishing obstacles? Smash those stone walls to pieces, not with your head (silly dinosaur!), but with mighty meteor showers! Take that, you pesky walls!

Devour delicious burgers along the way, run carefully and watch out for water, a dino can't swim (who knew?) Let's keep our dinosaur dry, shall we?

Are you ready for this wild dinosaur adventure? The fun is endless, just like our dino's world!

Go ahead, let's run like a dinosaur to victory! Rawrr!

name: Misión Triple R
description: This game, which was given away to various schools, aims to teach kids from Málaga about the importance of taking care and respecting their environment. The game mostly consists of trivia questions about variosu general areas of the province of Málaga, like the city or the mountain. Every couple of questions the game will present the player with a minigame like matching cards or racing on foot to a location. The objective of the game is to beat it in under 40 minutes, which done correctly would allow the player to enter a contest.

name: The Night Owl Murder
description: You need to solve the case before a chip in victim's head runs of out time. However, the time passes ONLY through your actions. So feel free to read and listen to dialogues in your own pace. Time passes only when you click on a dialogue option. Time is limited so choose wisely!

name: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes
description:
The first in the series to include rollback netcode, prepare for blistering online matches.
New moves and new battle systems have been added to further evolve the battle.
Experience high-octane battles with ultra high definition pixel graphics.

The tale of the Hollow Night is about to reach its climax...!

name: Tomorrow is my Birthday
description:
we don't have to do this
why don't we just leave?

There's a certain kind of coolness haunting this summer. And two friends want to run away from it. Get to know Petal, Bios and their summery secret.

The words you choose to say during this journey will decide its ending. Watch all the flowers closely. Breathe in the humid colors around you. Catch the essence of Petal and Bios' relationship. To escape this skewed reality.

A denpa Point-and-Click-Adventure about becoming a person, giving up, and a doomed friendship. And don't forget that you always can go home again.

When i’m near death i feel more real.
Do you feel real often in your life?
I forget... all the time.

name: Camelot
description: An early multiplayer online RPG for the PLATO system.

name: Tasokare Hotel Re:newal
description:
Tasokare Hotel Re:newal is an adventure game on Steam, iOS, and Android. This is a remake of Tasokare Hotel. The goal of game is to escape the hotel.

The game is divided into three parts: novel, search, and interrogation. You read the story in the novel part. In the search part, you find the evidence you need to solve. The interrogation part you use evidence to get to the bottom of the case.

name: Goodboy Galaxy/Witch n' Wiz
description: The Goodboy Galaxy/Witch n' Wiz dual cartridge for Evercade features two grand adventures to enjoy on your Evercade systems. In Goodboy Galaxy, you'll take to the stars as Maxwell the dog as you seek to repair his broken hyperdrive. And in Witch n' Wiz, you'll tackle devious puzzles on a quest to save your childhood friend from a magical fate!

name: Demons of Asteborg/Astebros
description: Discover the legends of Asteborg in two fantastic 16-bit games for Evercade. Fight back the demon invasion in Demons of Asteborg, and discover the origins of Asteborg in the roguelite platform adventure Astebros.

name: Head Soccer
description:
Move to the side, hard-to-control soccer !
A soccer game with easy controls that everyone can learn in 1 second.

name: Delivering Hope
description: Get IRyS flying and deliver hope as far as you can in this hololive fangame!

name: Big Yeetus
description: As the unicorn Big Yeetus you have to run along a parcour to the top of the castle. Most things in the game will kill you instantly if you touch them. This is a difficult game that takes some practice to beat. When you have learned how to pass a section you can finish it very fast though.

name: Pokémon Castaway
description: Welcome to Pokémon Castaway! The player is the (not-so) fortunate winner of a trip to Alola. On the flight there, however, the plane is struck down. Landing on the mysterious Bermada Island, the player is tasked with exploring their environment while searching for fellow survivors and a way off of the island. As the player traverses further inland, it becomes evident that the island is anything but deserted. Will the player find a way off the island? And, more importantly, will they get to go on an Alolan vacation?

name: Lost Ascension
description: This mod takes up the mantle of expanding and perfecting the recipe that DDLC created back in 2017. With a precise focus on character development, world building, and psychological emotions, you won't find another mod quite like it. If you're after a mod that gives love and care to its characters (both literally and metaphorically), then you've come to the right place. This is an 8-9 hour experience, best suited for readers who are after seeing the dokis grow into better people, all the while facing off against impossible challenges, and plenty of sweet moments to truly cultivate into something memorable. The Silence Will Be Broken.

name: Yugen Saga
description: Yugen Saga is a new 2D MMORPG that you can access and play either through our client on our discord or on your web browser at play.yugensaga.com! This game has all kinds of progression and ways to build your character to your own liking. The max level of this game is level 50, once you hit this you can sell your experience from your journey which is levels 1 through 50. However, that is not all, after level 50 you still gain experience but it banks in your experience bar which you can then sell into all kinds of stats. The more you sell into a stat the more costly it gets though depending on the class of course the numbers are different. With the sale of experience, you unlock new maps and new content at certain thresholds of sales. So for example at 50 million experience sold you unlock a map where you can obtain gear and items for that sold which is Pirate's Cove! The style was inspired by NexusTK however we have taken 2D mmorpgs to a whole new level! We are completely free to play and the only things that will ever be released are cosmetic items in the cash shop so come join now and see what areas you unlock and new continents to explore!

name: R-Ack
description:
R-Ack (Pronounced "Are Ah-ck") is a "No Rules" collaboration similar to the Yumps and the VIPs where there is no level design standard. The title has a hidden meaning, referencing the abstract term "RomhACK" where anything goes so long as it's a romhack.

Featuring 35+ levels that totals to 50 exits. Set aside your expectations, as this hack is anything but normal. Actually, inside the chaos could be something normal? Who knows.

You control an entity known as "The Plumber" in search to find the good in the world of R-ACK. Your mission is to simply traverse the landscapes.

name: Central De Fantasmas: Los Huéspedes De Mortimer
description: Spanish educative graphic adventure game from the year 2003, developed by CMY Multimedia destined for children between 6-12 years.

name: Grand Ore Deal
description: Solve puzzles, find secret levels and mine magical ore which makes you faster the more you carry and bring it back to the level start to complete levels

name: Joyville
description: Joyville is a horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. Brace yourself for a gripping journey through the shadows, solving puzzles, and trying to survive amidst the hidden horrors that await you.

name: One More Dash
description: Dash. Collect. Die. Repeat. A deceptively simple game about timing.

name: SCP: Nemesi
description: SCP: Nemesi is a multiplayer survival-horror game where one player takes on the role of the SCP (anomalous creatures, each with its own abilities and appearance), and the other four players play as Humans, each with their own personal goals and tasks that may branch into different paths.

name: One More Bounce
description: Simply draw a line to bounce your way to victory in this unique zen-like game!

name: One More Jump
description: One More Jump is a hand-crafted arcade platformer from the team that brought you One More Line and Thumb Drift. Simple to learn one touch controls. Hard to master levels that will test your muscle memory, concentration and sanity!

name: Project A-ko
description: A PC-88 visual novel based on the anime.

name: Project A-ko 2
description: The second Project A-ko video game for PC-88.

name: Click Manga: Opera Za no Kaijin
description: Click Manga: Opera Za no Kaijin is a interactive comic game based on the The Phantom of the Opera novel in which the player can make advance the comic story clicking in it. The gameplay is that the player has to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene.

name: Idle Angels: Realm of Goddess
description: Sin descripción

name: Click Manga: Click no Hi
description: An interactive comic with designs by Izumi Takemoto.

name: Dead or Love
description:
An epic of suspense and romance.
Who will you choose to live with in a paradise of love and desire?
Will you be able to escape alive?!

name: Ephemeral Dreams, Eternal Love
description: A boys love visual novel.

name: Mondai no Aru Share House
description: A visual novel by Favary.

name: Pucca Jam
description: Pucca Jam is a fan made flash game. Press the correct letter on your keyboard when Pucca or Garu are over the blossom icon. The closer to the beat you are the more points you get!" Their is 6 levels in total (3 levels per character).

name: Butcher's Creek
description: Use rusty tools to brutalize a perverted gang of serial torturers in the remote Appalachian Forest.

name: Kagi wo Kakushita Kago no Tori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key
description: Kagi wo Kakushita Kago no Tori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key is a mystery visual novel where the main character and four heroines who live in a mansion work together to solve a murder that took place in their town.

name: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key
description: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key is the western release of the mystery visual novel where the main character and four heroines who live in a mansion work together to solve a murder that took place in their town.

name: Lyssa
description:
"Let us live, since we must die"

Lyssa Is an RPG developed by Vih. You will be playing as Alayss, a college student warped into the Soul World, a world full of demons and deceased spirits. Will she be able to find the person who kidnapped her while trying to regain the faith of her late best "friend"? Or will she fall into despair?

name: Voxel Doom II
description: Voxel Doom II is the follow up to 2022's award-winning Voxel Doom. This is a new graphics mod that replaces all monsters, weapons, props and items with fully 3d voxel models. It replaces all monsters from both Doom and Doom II.

name: Demons of Problematique
description: A short trip through hell, set on by a classic Doom story. Originally intended as just a Boom compatible level, I got a little carried away with it, especially the ending credits\scenes.

name: Demons of Problematique 2
description: An obvious sequel to Demons of Problematique. No cutscenes (aside from the ending), no new weapons, no new monsters, just Doom. With some fancy effects.

name: Barbie Girl
description:
Barbie Girl is a single, limit-removing complevel 2 (doom (strict)) map for DOOM 2.
This was made in response to a Doomworld post that nobody should ever use a MIDI of the pop song "Barbie Girl" by Aqua in a Doom map.

name: Spectrum
description:
"Shooters are brown", I hear.
Well, maybe since Quake they are, but Doom is actually a pretty colourful game.
Just to prove it, here is a new episode for Ultimate Doom, using only standard textures and flats, and nary a hint of brown.

SPECTRUM is an Ultimate Doom (complevel 3) episode for limit removing ports. It features nine wholly new levels, a custom boss monster (sprites & sound by Eriance, dehacked by @Obsidian), and new music (by @Taw Tu'lki). It is primarily designed for pistol start single player, but is playable in continuous and/or co-op modes. Deathmatch is not supported. ﻿

name: Slayer
description:
SlayeR is an episode WAD made by Richard Wiles. It also includes four deathmatch maps.

The first level is rather unique compared to the others. It is a large, expansive map while the other nine levels are short to medium and quite focused.

name: Fortnite: Airphoria Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: ZampanioSimulator
description: ZampanioSimulator is a browser-based simulation game, later released in standalone form on itch.io, that purports to be a simulation of an old retro game called Zampanio. Solve bizarre puzzles, explore uncanny replicas of various websites, and try to find out just how deep the rabbit hole goes. Can you make your mark on the world? Zampanio is a very good game. You should play it.

name: Strinova
description: Strinova is an anime-style third-person tactical competitive shooter developed by Day 1 Studio. Switch freely between three-dimensional and two-dimensional in this one-of-a-kind shooter experience with a unique tactical shooting system.

name: Rezident Evil: It Is Escape
description: Rezident Evil: It Is Escape is a bizarre RPG Maker 2003 game. Starting life as the sequel to a terrible Resident Evil fan game from 2003, it gradually mutated into a Matt LeBlanc infested fever dream.

name: Monument
description:
This is a complete episode 2 replacement for DOOM.
Instead each map has been through hours and hours of either adjusting or complete revamping in DoomBuilder to make them stand out as fresh, new maps that will hopefully give players a solid and fun gaming experience - even for those of you, who've played these maps before.

name: The 64 kb challenge: Vanilla
description: 34 maps made under or equal the file size limitation of 64 kylobites, all these levels are vanilla doom / DOS executable friendly.

name: The 64 kb challenge: Limitless
description: 35 maps made under or equal the file size limitation of 64 kylobites, all these levels are limit-removing ports (complevel 2) compatible, don't play these with vanilla sets or original DOS executable

name: Incineration
description: A replacecment for Episode 3 of Doom. Just maps in here no new music or graphics.

name: The Great Urban Battle
description: One Player ..... One City ..... Many Monsters. Your mission is simple. Seek, destroy and escape!

name: Data.Expand
description:
A procedural player-controller multimedia sculpture driven by fast-paced arcade gameplay.

Survive as long as you can while avoiding enemies. As you do, your hits will generate glitch-like visual and enticing sounds.

name: I Am Bad at People, but Turns Out I’m Even Worse at Making Games
description: A conversational Whack-A-Tentacle game.

name: Quick Draw
description: This is a multiplayer game where each player has a cowboy with a gun. You must shoot your partner before he shoots you. The first to reach five wins. Use the Cacti and passing wagon for cover. Each player’s score is displayed at the top of the screen.

name: HexaWars
description: Retro twin stick shooter that gradually gets more difficult as you defeat more waves of enemies and Bosses.

name: Football Star Life 23/24
description: Become a football player and lead the career of your dreams. Be precise, score as many goals as possible, make the right choices during the transfer window, win numerous prestigious trophies, and become a legend!

name: Mini Garden Cafe
description: Mini Garden Cafe is a cute and simple relaxation game where you make and sell coffee, bread, and plants to expand your shop and fill up a Dex.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom
description: A collection of 80 Bingo Pinball simulations. Discover why people became addicted to these mysterious machines in the past. 'For amusement only', but used for gambling nevertheless. Too dangerous, so eventually banned in many states. Start right away: Bally Show Time is included, free to use!

name: Neon City of Desires
description: The world is becoming more and more modern, but mental problems remain with humanity. Immerse yourself in this world with the main characters and find out what fate will befall them. Is this really the city of dreams?

name: Movierooms: Cinema Management
description: Become the manager of your own Cinema in this thrilling new Tycoon! Through space and time, explore the various aspects of handling a thriving business. Manage movie choices and screenings, staff, rooms, and more!

name: Bellus Battle
description: Enter the world of Bellus, a world where cute animals run wild in a epic battle for glory. Blast your friends with Shotguns, Rail guns, Zeus lightning bolts, Bombs, Portal Guns, and much more. This is Bellus Battle. Be the last one standing!

name: Escape from Nalaxion
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled, intergalactic battle like never before in our intense FPS shooter game! As a brave commander leading your platoon on a critical raid on Nalaxion 54, fate takes a thrilling turn when you accidentally stumble upon a hidden trap door.

name: Monday Meltdown
description: Unleash your inner Monday rage in "Monday Meltdown," a 2D multiplayer mayhem. Engage in intense battles across casual environments like the office, gym, and grocery store. With a vast arsenal of weapons, be the first to achieve 10 kills for victory. Let off some steam and conquer Monday madness!

name: She Fell Off
description: Uncover the cryptic remnants of a destroyed world in "She Fell Off," a solo-developed indie game. Embark on Eve's intense journey through a dark post-apocalyptic underworld, devoid of familiar life. Navigate a dark environment, endure unforgiving gameplay, and immerse yourself in an eerie mystery.

name: Captain Goose
description: Captain Goose is a shoot 'em up game in the style of naval battles and the golden age of piracy. Accuracy and precision calculation will help keep your ship afloat and ensure the success of your mission. The strongest will survive at sea!

name: Ursine Science
description: A fantasy visual novel featuring intense action at every turn, following the struggles of a bear trapped in the body of a man. Part II of The Enonoia Saga, and the definitive conclusion to Ovine Replica.

name: Final Flock
description: Build a powerful flock and take to the skies to battle hordes of enemies. Glide and weave through perilous obstacles to gather resources and loot. Unlock powerful synergies and abilities to survive as long as you can.

name: Tragedy Theater
description: Tragedy Theater is an RPG Maker Horror game. You'll get the thrill of being chased by those mascots. Don't get caught. Help your friend, result puzzles and choose the choice that won't make our boy out of his mind.

name: Lumiel the Awakening
description: Lumiel the Awakening is an Open World Top Down Hack and Slash RPG Game set in a Fantasy Sci-fi Setting. Stranded on an island, players focus on exploration, building, and harvesting while battling monsters, collecting rare items, and uncovering hidden treasures in diverse dungeons.

name: Idle Build RPG
description: This game is an idle RPG game. Players only need a few simple operations to enjoy the joy of obtaining top-quality equipment.

name: Bridge Hunter
description: Greetings, pilot. Get ready to deploy your drone for the mission at hand! Your objective is to prevent the enemy from using a vital bridge. You have the freedom to try out various tactics and abilities in a fully destructible environment. Your role is crucial!

name: Entity: The Black Day
description: Entity: The Black Day is an action and psychological horror game with a long psychological story The game is developed on Unreal Engine

name: Water Me & You
description: Water Me & You is a cozy two-player co-op adventure in which you play as a water droplet or a seed-like creature that can change states, on a quest to regenerate a world left behind by humans.

name: Dragonscale Monastery
description: Tame the mountain peak and create a dragon sanctuary. Carefully expand your monastery and discover the secrets of dragon breeding. Survive harsh winters, limited resources, hunger, cold, and many other adversities. Experience unique survival city-builder in the world of Dragonscale Monastery.

name: Paint
description: A unique real puzzle game using colors in a notebook.

name: Planet Iridium
description: Planet Iridium is a third person, top-down, fantasy, Sci-Fi game. The game is heavily based around colony, economy and base building. Along with close-quarter combat and unique survival systems that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you unveil the deep dark secrets of Planet B58.

name: Gobo’s Arena
description: Fight your way through the arena against other players ‘til only the goblin king remains

name: Dust Raiders
description: Dust Raiders is a management strategy game, set in a lawless wasteland. Upgrade your vehicles, engage in tactical fights against raiders hunting for your resources and gather a crew to rule the area.

name: Thursday Nite Thunkin'
description: I'm not sure why there are two descriptions but pretend I put something really funny here

name: Zombiflux: Sleepless War
description: Survive and create your own civilization!

name: Fun Infused Arcade
description: Collection of small retro arcade games created by Fun Infused Games in a retro style. More games to be added in the future. Currently featuring the games Bounce Blitz, Haunting of Jerk Miners, Ultra Neon, and Ultra Aktion.

name: Sans Logique
description: Sans Logique is a first-person game that blends puzzle and adventure gameplay. You'll explore different dreamlike worlds, discover the story of your character, and solve some original puzzles.

name: Square Dungeon 2
description: "Square Dungeon 2" is a dungeon exploration + roguelite text-based indie game. The demon king left a prophecy to the human king before death that the warriors would betray him when the Armageddon came. As a warrior, what will you choose on the Armageddon?

name: Conviction
description: Conviction is a FPS, Dark fantasy DOOM-like, play as a man with nothing left to lose as you face off the onslaught of cultists and demons in a world enshrouded by darkness, prepare to show your conviction...

name: Cats & Castles
description: In 'Cats & Castles', as King of the Cats, you must build, manage, and defend the greatest kingdom a cat has ever seen. Choose your cards wisely and balance your economy, food supply, and military. It's your responsibility to defend your kingdom from monsters with your mighty cat soldiers.

name: Galvanic Bride
description: Feel the intenseness of stealth in the eerie great mansion of Frankenstein. Play Bride, Frankenstein’s creation, Perfect yet incomplete. Use electric interactions and skills to overcome challenges in your style. Think and struggle through the intertwining conspiracy, and resolve in your own ending.

name: Orcish Skies
description: Orcish Skies blends Roguelike deckbuilding, turn-based, Slay The Spire-styled gameplay with a grid-based map. Fire a missile into a cluster of enemies. Rain down lightning on an enemy Carrier from afar. Fly past a swarm of frigates to pick off the sniper shooting you from across the map.

name: Surreal House
description: A point-and-click puzzle game inspired by escape rooms. Enter the house if you dare.

name: Plunko
description: Plunko is an action platformer with an energetic twist!

name: Hazy Hollow
description: Dig and explore the depth of the earth. Mine and harvest miscellaneous resources. Craft better tools and weapons and expand your base ! Fight against local mobs. Unlock electricity to lighten the darker depths. Automate harvesting to reign on the underground world !

name: Mechanical Growth
description: Mechanical Growth is a built-for virtual reality game set in a fantasy Post-Apocalyptic world. Captain of your independent company, Loot, shoot, kick and scream your way to your next contract.

name: Infasia
description: Vous êtes Xen, un diplomate d'une région paisible du Nord qui se retrouve plongé dans la capitale du monde d'Infasia. Entre guerres de clans, invasion de Sans-âmes, lutte entre des puissances incommensurables, vous devrez vous forger un nom dans ce royaume pour accomplir vos objectifs…

name: Dragon Quest X: Mirai he no Tobira to Madoromi no Shoujo Online
description: This is the sixth major expansion for Dragon Quest X, known as Version 7, which will feature a new story, new characters, a new area called Zenias, and the new master vocation Dragon Mage.

name: Celebrities Hacked
description: Celebrities Hacked' takes you on a mesmerizing journey that pairs the familiar excitement of classic Qix and Xonix games with an innovative, bold twist. Here, your skills and reflexes are rewarded with a gallery of art that peels back the curtain on some of the most alluring celebrities. As you navigate the game landscape, strategically deploy power-ups, and overcome ticking clock challenges, you unlock the enthralling, unseen layers of the stars' private lives.

name: Crystal Journey
description: Are you ready to embark on a journey of discovery and puzzles? Welcome to 'Crystal Journey', the ultimate 3D puzzle game that challenges you to navigate a world of secrets and obstacles. Play as Lum, the brave adventurer on a quest to find the purple crystal, a rare and powerful artifact that holds the key to unlocking untold wonders.

name: Monster Jam Game
description: Bringing the family-friendly entertainment of live Monster Jam events straight to your tablet or mobile phone all year round, Monster Jam is an authentic and dynamic mobile gaming experience! Monster Jam will not only allow you to relive your favourite Monster Jam moments but to create your own memorable monster truck stunts using all the biggest names in Monster Jam, including Grave Digger, El Toro Loco, Maximum Destruction and Monster Mutt! Smash through barriers in actual Monster Jam events and races, or freestyle through unique environments and hill climbs!

name: Rocket Carz Racing
description:
Rocket Carz Racing - Never Stop is the first game in the series of future in past Rocket Carz Racing games. Enjoy a new futuristic look of classic retro cars in the genre of endless arcade racing.
Real racing simulator of vintage cars with rocket engines! No wheels, no asphalt limits, only air flow and power of jet engines.
Drive each of your unique and super fast car through traffic of most known retro cars.

name: Block City Cop: Vice Town
description:
Block City Cop: Vice Town is an open world police simulator with shooter and racing elements. You play as a brave cop the purpose of which is to save the city from crime. You have to fight with armed gangsters, using all kinds of weapons and transport (police car, taxi, bus etc.).
In this game, you can freely navigate around the city, help residents, complete missions getting rid of bandits and get coins for it.

name: Dig Girl
description:
As the last surviving heir of your great uncle Ludwig, you’ve inherited his Bavarian castle and its underground treasures. It’s up to you to survive each level and find... the greatest treasure of all.
30-levels of ad-free, retro-style graphics and gameplay await. Supports game controllers, landscape and portrait orientation, and comes with a custom level editor.

name: Super Snail
description:
Enter the Snailverse through an unusual idle RPG.
Control a snail summoned from a dystopian future. The Gods, deciding to save this world, have sent you on a mission.
With a divine purpose and what remains of civilization, you journey through the past to take down eight Demon Gods. To defeat their apostles and minions, you must collect a variety of items and explore every inch of the world. You will join hands with many bizarre beings in your quest to save the world.

name: Toast Shooter
description:
Toast Shooter is a fast action packed arcade style tap-the-right-item game!
Get your Jelly Cannon ready for all those tasty butter toasts jumping out of the toasters. But be careful - do not hit the dark toasts! Catch Rocket Toasts, Collect Bonuses- and Power Stars, repair defect toasters, get tap-combos and play bonus rounds to beat the high score!

name: Cheesy Munch
description: Eat the ham, skip the bombs!

name: Flying Mustaches
description: Help the smileys get mustaches! Tap the screen to fling a mustache towards a smiley. If there are more than 10 smileys without mustaches, you lose.

name: FishOrChicken
description: You can take your time and prepare your equipment beforehand! You can dive intently while avoiding enemies with a small amount of equipment! Be careful not to make too many items! You can have up to 16 items If you make too much, it might be a big deal. Aim for a high score!

name: Porta-Tower
description: Porta-Tower is a roguelike tower defense game where you can pick up and move your towers when their position becomes suboptimal. Relocate, upgrade, and unlock towers to defend your portal until the very end.

name: Emme Saves the Galaxy
description: Join Emme the dog as she battles block invaders in this puzzle action game. Defeat all kinds of unpredictable blocks across hundreds of levels.

name: Fruits of Fury
description: Lace up your boots! Fruits of Fury is a bullethell roguelike (bullet heaven) where you will decimate waves of fruit minions using an arsenal of unlockable and upgradeable skills. Then, step into the ring and face off against the champion fruit bosses as you journey from rookie to legend!

name: Currently Unstable
description: Master electrifying puzzles in 'Currently Unstable'! Strategically transfer electricity, utilize dynamic electrical components, and conquer each level to Activate the Power Core. Unleash your puzzle-solving skills and tame the currents for endless fun!

name: FlyBird Leap
description: Ready to push the limits of flight? Control the bird to fly over various obstacles, unlock the beauty picture, and become the champion of air flight!

name: Little Eden
description: In this mix of farming simulator and spaceship shooter, you control Little Eden, a flying farm-ship. Destroy planetoids, collect seeds to plant, craft ammunition and fight for survival against the terrible Pirate Coalition.

name: Digital City
description: Digital City is a novel simulator intended to support local authorities representatives and urban planners in their day-to-day work.

name: Death Animal Parade
description: Casual Strategy game full with Animals

name: Cube RPG
description: cube

name: Death of Eternity
description: You were created to purge all that defile. Slaughter hoards of such filth, gaining powerful items and abilities with every drop of blood. Forge your own path through the heavens fully customizing your experience. Share in this virtuous crusade with up to three friends in Online multiplayer co-op!

name: Lost Tenet
description: In a war-torn 13th century, the once protectors become the predators. After the razing of the sister city of Romne, the Knights Solomin have tasked themselves with the extermination of the alleged party responsible, the Clergy.

name: Starfuse
description: Embark on an epic sci-fi sandbox adventure across multiple planets in this 2D sidescroller. Explore, fight creatures, craft, and build in in a fully destructible world. Unleash the power of simulated elements, ride vehicles, and customize your character.

name: Artisan Story
description: Aspiring to be the best artisan in the world, our young artisans are opening their own workshop complete with a monster ranch. Tame monsters from the dungeon, tend to your fantasy farm, collect materials and craft recipes, and experience a carefree story rich fantasy life

name: Revamped
description: A completely non linear adventure, with screen filling bosses, which could have been named Metroidvania if it wasn't for legal issues.

name: To Mortal Dust
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Project Watcher
description: The chaos will never end. Decimate your enemies, fight against hordes of invaders who know no mercy. Dozens of enemy types await you. Old comrades will stand in your way. Shoot first and never ask questions.

name: Making Lovers: HD Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: A Step From Insanity
description: A Step From Insanity is a 2D platformer-shooter where you play as a man with many psychological illnesses searching for the end to his insanity. Guided by an unfamiliar friend, search for the mysterious sanity powders told to be able to cure any mental illness.

name: Smoots Pinball
description: Enjoy an exciting and fun multiplayer pinball experience with Smoots Pinball! Play on 5 tables based on our popular Smoots games, complete missions, and unlock extras. Can you score 1,000,000 points? Play solo or with friends and show off your pinball skills!

name: Dark Eyed Angels
description: Dark Eyed Angels is a story based survival horror game. A darker vision of the Grey Alien phenomenon. You play as Casey, when sightings are reported to occur around a strange weather phenomena and now it's on track to his home. He decides to stay and meet THEM

name: Excised
description: You awaken as a fugitive in a dystopian city. Choose your equipment and go! Run for your life as you are hunted down. Find a way to escape this dystopian city, in this action horror game with a innovative stealth system and immersive sim elements.

name: Emberward
description: Emberward is a unique tower defense game that focuses on maze building and interesting tower mechanics. Construct mazes with blocks of different shapes and set up defense towers on them to withstand the onslaught of monsters!

name: Over Jump Rally
description: RALLY! Hot blazing sun!Relive arcade racing with Over Jump Rally – an unofficial remake of Sega Rally from the '90s. Unreal Engine 5-powered stunning graphics, nostalgic music, and intuitive controls bring classic racing to a new generation. Easy, right? Maybe!

name: Forlorn Outcast
description: Confront fate in Forlorn Outcast, an immersive souls-like RPG. Stand your ground against the Drothar hordes, channel powerful spells, and discover the dark fantasy realm of Tilsa as you ascend from outcast to legend.

name: Cat City
description: In this game you will need to explore the whole city, as well as many other rooms to find all the seals! A cat named "Ponytail" will help you figure out the game, and will fully introduce you to what is happening in this cute little cat town!

name: One Life to Alice
description: This game consists of two interconnected parts. The first part is a visual novel about a girl named Alice, living in the near future. The pleasant visual presentation and a story based on real events will not leave you indifferent.

name: Super Space Arcade
description: SUPER SPACE ARCADE is a fast-paced 3D interpretation of the classic arcade shooter games combined with action platformer elements.

name: Cyber Cell
description: Set in a post apocalyptic world, Cyber Cell is a fast paced shooter meant to be both challenging and satisfying. Fight your way through the levels to find out who is behind your suffering.

name: Ooze Odyssey
description: Ooze your way through dank dungeons and dissolve thousands of monsters in this top-down shoot’em up roguelite. Slay enough and gather their essence to earn new cards from the Witch’s deck. Defeat powerful foes and explore deep places to earn more cards for your deck!

name: Insanity's Grip
description: Insanity's Grip is a first-person psychological horror game in which the player uncovers the secrets of his forgotten past and experiences nightmares from which he can no longer escape. Be careful, some visions can be more dangerous than they seem!

name: Escape the Dark Tower
description: Step into a realm of mystery and magic with Escape the Dark Tower, a captivating escape room adventure in charming pixel art.

name: Outer Wards: Proving Grounds
description: Build up your defenses and ward off any threats to your expedition in this rogue-like tower defense game. Manage your resources well and make sure no to overstay your welcome on this planet, or be prepared to face a never-ending onslaught of crustaceans...

name: Star Apprentice: Dazzling Danmaku Detective
description: Find evidence, interrogate suspects, and shoot down contradictions in this magical girl detective game! Your magic turns each interrogation into a bullet hell logic battle - Use it to uncover the truth behind each magical mystery in your way!

name: Chaos-Alante
description: A magical online game with multiple players online, mainly featuring a rich skill set, highly playable equipment system, and a rich combat experience as its core. Use different options and combinations to engage in treasure brushing, challenge boss, and PVP battles, and win rich trophies

name: Pricolage: Idolized
description:
Who are you...?
Pricolage: Idolized is an SNS-based interactive Visual Novel.

name: Flawless Darkness
description: Flawless Darkness is designed so that blind and non-blind people can have the same play experience. That's why you play the game only with sound, with no graphics at all. Players will have a special experience just escaping the maze in darkness.

name: Farmwand
description: Welcome to the world of Farmwand! Farmwand is an open-world fantasy adventure with lots of farming, potions and spells, where you will immerse yourself in an enchanted land full of monsters, magical creatures and tons of interesting characters.

name: Godwalker
description: Godwalker is a single player FPS Roguelike where the faster you play the stronger you get.

name: DreadFall
description: Embark on a chilling odyssey in Dreadfall, a horror platformer where you descend into your own nightmare. Fight monsters, solve puzzles, and upgrade your abilities as you journey through a haunting dream world.

name: Rixer
description: Rixer is a fast paced 6 degrees of freedom space combat sim. Battle it out in different PvP game modes with bot support and compete in high speed races. Experiment with extensive live-multiplayer stat modding and map editor.

name: Marki Game Collection
description: Play with up to 16 players selected mini-games in random order. Two players can share one controller that everyone can play! More than 12 different games that are easy to learn and unique in their mechanics!

name: Spawn Master
description: A game pitting the cunning strategy of the Spawn Master against the teamwork and bravery of the Humans. Spawn Master is two unique gameplay experiences in one. Spawn Master combines FPS and RTS experience into one terrifying package.

name: Rune Golf
description: Guide a small golf ball through the ruins of a forgotten civilization, filled with traps and mysteries. Explore the remnants of a lost people, combining skill and curiosity in a unique narrative and contemplative journey!

name: Tangled Crisis
description: Beat the maze with limited vision before the time runs out! Avoid the dangers, find secret chests and shortcuts, while trying to get the highest score, in this casual retro themed experience.

name: Pixels With Comics
description: Pixels With Comics is musical bullethell game that based on avoid pixels and get defeated by comics, also enjoy music and absolutely die and don't forget to repeat.

name: Keys and Kastles
description: Welcome to Keys and Kastles, a simple but very challenging platform game! Go through different stages and try to look for hidden treasures! Be careful as there are traps around every corner! Good luck!

name: Tooncop
description: Battle mischievous cartoons that have escaped their TV shows and save humanity in this thrilling FPS Horde Shooter. Players need to survive 15 minutes with an aim to reach the highest level possible with the most amount of cash. Do you have what it takes to step into the shoes of Tooncop?

name: Century of Steam
description: Century of Steam is a physics-based multiplayer railroad simulator and strategy game. Build your route through beautiful landscapes, customize and operate your fleet of historic trains, discover the sights, sounds, and stories of railroading with industry-leading steam, firing, and audio simulation.

name: Meine Oma 88
description: Meine Oma(88) is a non-linear exploration adventure that delves into the issues of transgenerational trauma linked to perpetrators in Nazi Germany. Play to escape the ever-looping narrative your grandmother tries to serve you as the truth.

name: Zen with a Pen
description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey. Draw lines, guide the enso symbol, and conquer challenging maps. With a minimalistic style, casual (sometimes) yet addictive gameplay, this game offers a perfect blend of relaxation and arcade fun. Can you master each level and achieve true serenity?

name: Surfing Legends
description: Surf the waves, rescue the wildlife, and collect the magic diamonds in this thrilling adventure! Buy faster boards and beat the clock to open new levels!

name: Thawed Waters
description: Boating adventure of the old priest who stands against the ruthless corporation practising animal testing. Dive into flooded Siberia of 2047, where remnants of humanity fight another thawed virus. The game offers unique physics-based gameplay, wrapped in a heartfelt rabbits rescue saga.

name: Pet Shop World
description: Manage your own Pet Shop like no one else!

name: Epic Trains 4
description: Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.

name: Sojo
description: An online RPG with a persistent world, gear/level based progression, fast active turn based combat, platforming puzzles, and challenging objectives. Kill creatures, get loot, sell and buy loot, group with allies, and progress to overcome the games greatest challenges.

name: Overlode
description: A groundbreaking battle simulator blending deckbuilding and explosive real-time isometric action. Lead autonomous characters, conquer powerful enemies, and strategize your deck to overcome randomized challenges. Endless replayability and strategic depth await in this captivating experience.

name: Lights of Life
description: In this medieval-themed horror game, you'll stealthily navigate a semi-open world, escaping from zombies and vampires to survive. A thrilling adventure awaits filled with fear, action, and secrecy!

name: Alchemist: The Garden
description: You find yourself in a strange garden. You aren't sure how you got here but you know what you must do, escape! The path is simple, but nothing is as easy as it seems. Learn the rules of the garden if you wish to escape. Caution - this game is simple but can be challenging!

name: Floating Wonderland
description: A 2D platformer set in a world of floating islands where gravity acts with strange properties and can point in any direction. Join one of 4 characters in their own story venturing through these strange and wonderful environments that twist and turn in all directions.

name: Cannon Block Ball
description: Knock down blocks from the platform using balls in this physics-based game. Encounter various block types, from explosive bombs to rotating and growing blocks, adding challenge and strategy to the gameplay.

name: Sunbeam
description: A garden-themed 2D RPG which tackles the struggle of problem-solving in an uncomfortable and unknown place. Solve and explore your way across this dark landscape to uncover the truth behind your visit, meeting a familiar face to keep you compay.

name: The Secrets of Skellig
description: A mysterious puzzle game with crossword inspired gameplay. Use your brain, keyboard, and mouse to unravel the secrets beneath a remote island.

name: Diesel Mechs
description: Physics-based demolition simulator with diesel mechs. Operate mechs and heavy equipment as if they were real. Learn how to effectively use the equipments in this physics-based environment.

name: Medieval Thief VR
description: "Medieval Thief", a thrilling single-player virtual reality game that takes you on a role-playing adventure set in a medieval world of darkness and secrecy. As a cunning thief, you will be equiped swords, bows and arrows to fend off soldiers trying to protect Medieval treasures

name: Cosmic Race: Galactic Showdown
description: Get ready to blast into retro-racing madness with Cosmic Race! Our game reignites the arcade racing thrill, hurling you through mind-bending tracks, intense combat, and eye-popping visuals. It's like the 80s and 90s racing games on turbo steroids—strap in and relive the glory days!

name: Projected Dreams
description: Drag toys from the shelves and drop them on the table to create a shadow play in this cozy puzzle game. As the shadows you cast uncover past family relationships and the environment around you changes and evolves, the lines between reality and fantasy blur.

name: Nothorian Online: Acceso Anticipado
description: Nothorian es un MMORPG de rol medieval, gótico y oscuro, basado en instancias funcionales sin una historia profunda y centrado más en la acción, la exploración y la construcción de tus personajes desde el Inicio. Inicia tu aventura con un guerrero, cazador, caballero, mago, druida, clérigo o monje.

name: Reincarnatio
description: "Reincarnatio" is a village-building card game. Build houses, populate them with people, and work to acquire resources. Construct various facilities to develop and expand the village.

name: The M/S Cornelia II Incident
description: Somewhere in the Nordic Archipelago a man wakes up with no memory of who he is, how he got there or what happened to him. A short point-and-click adventuregame about a man overboard survivor.

name: Text Adventure
description: Look at art, listen to jazz, and immerse yourself in the world of Joey Pawelko's Text Adventure.

name: Unit Down Charge
description: A futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, and epic boss battles!

name: Experimentation
description: A linear visual novel about five short stories, unrelated at first glance. Be prepared for mysticism, gloomy atmosphere and light psychological horror. Not recommended to play if you are experiencing depression or severe psychological state.

name: Pyrene
description: Defeat hellish monsters and rebuild your home in Pyrene, a fast paced roguelike dungeon-crawler. Play with different heroes & spells, collect powerful relics to upgrade your deck while uncovering the mysteries behind your village’s destruction.

name: Cydoku
description: A cyber themed, procedural generated, graphical Sudoku with over 2 million unique play-field permutations. Track your mastery by claiming achievements and gauge your play via in-game statistical analysis and Steam Leader boards!

name: Hustlerix
description: Play as Gaul in the ancient world in this action-packed, open-world game & with a classic gameplay style. Defeat mythological beasts, and overthrow senators. Experience gladiator fights, chariot races, and stone-throwing. Abolish slavery and carve your path to freedom.

name: TriFute
description: TriFute, a unique button soccer game, puts you in control of your team. Compete in thrilling matches and customize with mods in this immersive simulation.

name: Goddess of immortality
description: Goddess of immortality is a old school like strategy indie videogame, where i added all the keys i loved from old good wargames, and added a little part of action on top of it.

name: Rooms
description: Rooms — a multiplayer horror game for 2-4 players in an abandoned bunker. Survive, restore electricity, and escape from the maniac or hunt for victims. Procedural level generation will add uniqueness to each game.

name: Lifeforms: Binary Fission
description: Clone yourself to take over the environment in this bacterial evolution roguelite. Choose mutations and abilities each time you multiply and unlock new morphologies and environments. Compete against other evolving species in survival mode and experiment with unlocked abilities in sandbox mode.

name: Cryptower
description: Welcome to the world of Cryptower! In this captivating tower defense game, creativity and strategy intertwine. Develop your unique talents, enhance tower parameters, and unlock powerful abilities to defeat endless waves of enemies. Become a master of defense and protect your world

name: Bobls
description: Bobls is a precise and bouncy 2D retro platformer. Complete the story through the single player or unique two-player campaign, create and play levels made by the community through the level editor used by the developers themselves.

name: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
description: "The Backrooms: Last Expedition" is a cooperative horror game designed for 1 to 4 players. Its main objective is to create an enjoyable gaming experience for friends. Players will navigate through terrifying levels, filled with various entities and dangers, as they strive to escape.

name: Cats on Broombas
description: A wholesome MS-DOS puzzle-game about cats zooming around on Broombas collecting stars. They need your help!

name: Tense
description: Tense is a frantic action roguelite where you'll harness GunFu, Disco Balls, and Toasters to overcome demanding, fast-paced threats. Explore an unnerving yet playful city to uncover the secrets of HugFu and make some new friends along the way... if you can! No Rules, No Breaks, No Mercy.

name: Where Beasts Were Born
description: Where Beasts Were Born is an experimental Action-RPG with evolving creatures. As the creatures fight the players, they use a genetic algorithm to evolve unique, stronger evolutionary stages, including body, stats and brain - procedurally!

name: S: Lost Chapters
description: Prepare for a brand-new type of horror. Delve deeper into the depths of infamous stories once told and unearth the terrible secrets left behind. Brace yourself for an immersive journey that is equal parts horrifying and breathtaking. An experience that is both familiar, yet different…

name: Blight Bubbles
description: Embark on an singleplayer first person physics puzzle adventure in Blight Bubbles. Shoot bubbles, explore, defeat enemies and bosses and solve puzzles to restore the blighted world. Upgrade your bubble gun with new abilities like the ice ray to freeze bubbles into platforms.

name: Late Night Delivery: The Bewitched Collection
description: Experience the horrifying Halloween-themed sensual mischievousness of "Late Night Delivery: The Bewitched Collection"! Now with an exclusive third chapter that expands on the plot further. Buy it today, enjoy it tonight~

name: Truth of Beauty Witch: Marine's Treasure Ship
description: A miraculous collaboration between Houshou Marine and "Tsugunohi" has come to fruition! When the main character becomes a crew member of a pirate ship led by Houshou Marine and realizes a certain fact, you are struck by a series of horrors. Can you unravel the secret behind Houshou Marine's beauty?

name: Space Tournament
description: Space Tournament is the ultimate destination for experiencing captivating drifts in a stunning 2D space environment.

name: AntiGolfity
description: A unique spin on the golf genre where you play as the course — in space! Interact with the environment by moving, manipulating, and disabling pieces of the level in order to help guide your ball to the goal.

name: Cavemen Tales: Collector's Edition
description: Help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new home in this time management strategy game! Explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage!

name: Aurora Adventure: A Space Academy Tale
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure! Before You is an exciting space saga about the adventures of the cadets of the Academy of the Interstellar Order.

name: PP
description: This is a "butt" as the protagonist of the breakthrough game Players will take the role of a pink ass in a hurry to go to the toilet. Dodge all kinds of fast food attacks on the way, break through the obstacles and finally reach the toilet!

name: Galactic Warship
description: I always wanted to play a game where I could take direct control of a capital ship in 3D space. When I couldn't find that game, I decided to make it. As a solo developer I spent two years crafting Galactic Warship - letting you pilot massive capital warships in full 3D with complete 6-axis freedom.

name: Artifact Seeker: Legend of Aurorium
description: The Demon King invaded Aurorium. Heroes require legendary artifacts to save the world. Obtain them by defeating corrupted foes, collecting Vingold to trade with a merchant, or exploring altar chests. Level up to use skill combos and evolved skills against countless enemies. Defeat the demon king!

name: Food Truck Time Machine
description: Imagine if you were in a food truck that could travel through time! Your journey will span over 2 millennium with 5 different time periods each with its own set of customers and food. You are the time travelling food chef but can you cook your way home!

name: Seas of Kahtaone
description: A fantasy naval combat action-adventure game. Explore the open ocean and fend off pirates with your cannon broadsides and magical arsenal. Summon the wind to boost your ship forward and release fireballs to light up your enemies. Upgrade your ships armor, weapons, and much more to win the day.

name: Lunar Lander Beyond
description: Guide a roster of colorful pilots, eclectic advisors and state-of-the-art landers through a taxing series of missions. Deliver cargo, retrieve resources, and rescue stranded pilots as you navigate a mysterious universe of moons and planets.

name: Deep Under
description: DEEP UNDER is a grim visual novel about how an ordinary camping trip with friends can turn into a real nightmare.

name: Garbage Country
description: Drive through a pixel art 3D wasteland. Explore vast procedural terrains dotted with hand-crafted landmarks, each holding echoes of a forgotten past.

name: Squiigee
description: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!

name: Spelly Cat
description: Solve word puzzles. Rescue your owner. Get fed!

name: One Last Tale
description: The game allows 4 to 10 players to experience co-op and betrayal. You must comlete tasks while bewaring of the monsters among you. Whether to make best of your social deception and reasoning skills or just play it as a crazy party game is all up to you!

name: Storm Striker
description: Stormstriker is a hyperactive 5v5 PvP third-person shooter with colorful hero characters, action-packed gameplay, and an emphasis on teamplay! Join the battlefield by choosing a hero that’s right for your playstyle!

name: Time of the Wizard
description: Time of the Wizard is a Magic-Casting, Bullet-Hell, Dungeon-Crawler where you will: Burn, Poison, Freeze, Explode, Electrocute and Melt through hordes of enemies by casting your OWN spells. Take back the Wizard's stolen magical tome and destroy the remnants of the Monster King's army!

name: R00000
description: A home brewed 360° interactive horror flick. Witness a troubled soul craving to make a chilling home movie realize that the monster lies a lot deeper than he could have ever guessed. Play the cassette and rewind the terror hidden inside.

name: Stepan's Life
description: A simulator of the life of a Russian, where the player must develop his character and make decisions that affect his fate. The player must solve various puzzles and tasks to advance through the story.

name: Demise: Survival Uncharted
description: Survive Or Die. it's in the name. Welcome to a solo developed, online multiplayer survival game. From the shades of Rust and The Forest: build, craft, survive, and raid! Coming soon in early 2024 from Modern Monkey Studios.

name: Gelatinous: Humanity Lost
description: Gelatinous is a platforming adventure with deep roots in games like Mega Man, Metroid, Castlevania, and other classics.

name: Platformer Helmet
description: Achaapur is taken hostage by a local gangster Gundam. You are the only hope left. Each helmet has a unique super power. Switch between different helmets to use those powers. Fight against different goons of Gundam. A Platformer game that has fights and platforming action.

name: Squares and Stuff
description: Build, experiment, and share in Squares and Stuff, a pixel-retro sandbox game inspired by classic "falling sand" games. Unleash your creativity in an open-ended world filled with sandbox elements like water, paint, fire, sand, animals, humans, zombies, and a controllable 2D platform character.

name: Juna: The Dreamwalker
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating retro-style adventure. Utilize the transformative power of the rod to take on the appearance and abilities of monsters and objects. Unravel the dark origins of the monstrous invasion and discover the secrets behind the ancient portal.

name: Banners of Ruin: Iris
description: Summon spirits that augment your party with the haunted fox, Iris!

name: To Have and to Hold
description: A short boys love / yaoi / gay visual novel about a couple of cousins whose paths cross at a family wedding. They both get a little drunk, emotions run high, and things take a surprisingly steamy turn.

name: Unease
description: UNEASE is a 1 to 4 players co-op survival horror game presenting an array of episodes with innovative mechanics and different settings.

name: Touhou: The Unreachable Oneiroborder
description: “The Unreachable Oneiroborder” is a beginner-friendly Touhou-styled Bullet Hell shmup. Indulge in a uniquely Touhou experience with intricate patterns and stylish effects.

name: Whispered Promises: 14 Days of Love with Anna
description: This game is a cohabitation and management simulation where you live together with your beloved childhood friend. Enjoy your free time with Anna during the 14-days break!

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves
description: 26 years on, a brand-new entry in the Fatal Fury series is set to arrive on the scene! FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves features a unique art style that stimulates the senses and an innovative REV System that supercharges the excitement. Here, at long last, a new legend is about to unfold…

name: Space Maze
description: Help the crew of the Aurora and their captain, the fearless John Smith, to reach their destination and deliver the cure for humanity, thus saving the human race.

name: Milfvania Ep. 3
description: Encompass the whole story in this largest and final episode. Graduate from the so-called "KGB University" by building your harem. Don't mind the atmospheric, decaying background. The girls will make up for it!

name: Fattening Career
description: Welcome to Fattening Career, a Visual Novel that centers around feeding, weight gain, and a touch of breast expansion. In this game, you’ll have the opportunity to become an A+ Feeder, a chocolatier, a lab researcher, and more.

name: The Grey Dream
description: The Grey Dream is an adult Visual Novel about a man who got offered a job in an international trading company right after graduation. As soon as you accept it, the consequences of the past start to manifest. Who knows? Maybe you can get rid of your past or spice up your future with it.

name: Kingdoms Rise and Fall
description: Kingdoms Rise and Fall is a captivating Real-Time Strategy game that takes you on an epic journey through different eras, spanning the entirety of history and beyond!

name: Wanderer: Broken Bed
description: Wanderer: Broken Bed is a hentai adventure game with dating-sim, point-and-click and RPG elements that will take you to a world of pleasures and lewd adventures.

name: Maid Slaves & Golden Dungeon
description: A dungeon exploration RPG. Living a pure love life with a captured general. Go to the dungeon to earn money with the former general who now is my maid!

name: The Revenge of Tungsten
description: Bullet shooter with no visible bullets

name: Citron World Forward: Zero
description: Citron World is an action RPG in which players explore a 2D map, switching between characters with transformable weapons in a world bizarrely developed by a substance called "Citron". Become the "Seeker" and manipulate the search weapon "ArmoND" to find out the truth about the world.

name: Harvest on Jupiter
description:
Harvest on Jupiter is a simple, beautiful and relaxing, sci-fi puzzle game.
Harvest the energized cube from the Jupiter Tree with the force field of Harvest plasma ball by placing it close to the cube.

name: Galactic Starforce
description: Join the interstellar journey in "Galactic Starforce", a visual novel where you, the cadet, navigate a colorful crew in their quest to keep the cosmos sexy. Choose your alliances and find love amongst the stars!

name: Futanari di Funghi
description: Satisfy your customers by enriching their food with your nutritious & delicious futanari sauce!

name: Freedom Tower
description: Roleplaying set in a dystopian universe inspired by early twentieth-century wars and Ukrainian folklore. You are seventeen-year-old Orest, and you might be the last hope of your land occupied by the Black Empire.

name: Lusófona Games Collection 2023
description: Lusófona Games Collection 2023 is a selection of four distinct experiences, ranging from puzzle and exploration games to more action oriented ones. These experiences summarise the diverse work produced by our students, during their project based classes while attending the Video Games degree.

name: DDI Rally Championship
description: Strap in and get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed racing, as you navigate through dynamic terrains, including rugged mountains, dense forests, and treacherous deserts.

name: Bizarre Mushroom Cycle Simulator
description: The bizarre mushrooms will surely bring you surprise and healing. Watch them with enchanting fireflies, and listen to the forest sounds. Experience a unique life only mushrooms offer. Living as a mushroom isn't so bad after all. Let's fully enjoy the mushroom life together!

name: Chess Undress
description: Chess Undress is a 2D pixel chess game with a uniqe anime highschool storyline.

name: Servonauts
description: Servonauts is an absurd couch co-op fuel-attendant game for up to 4 players. Connect pipes, mix fuels and overcome deadly hazards to meet all the customers demands, or die hilariously while trying.

name: Dominions 6: Rise of the Pantokrator
description: In Dominions 6 you take control of a powerful being that rules a nation and aspires to godhood. The type of Pretender Gods can vary from magically powerful arch mages to old dragons or an enormous tree. Dominions is a deep 4x turn based strategy game with a very large variety of spells and units.

name: Yearning
description: “Yearning” is a visual novel type of game, telling the story of the protagonist Tan Kai’s ordinary and extraordinary life in the modern Chinese university campus.

name: Non-Fellows
description: Follow adventures of four not as much friends as they finds their way through zombie city, get acquainted with an ancient vampire and discover what happened to their cute blonde friend after this meeting. Republish of an old point-and-click adventure, with all 3 episodes in a single game.

name: TetherGeist
