description: TetherGeist is a 2D Precision Platformer about Mae, a young villager with a mysterious illness that has turned her right of passage into a treacherous journey. Join Mae in her struggle to prove herself as you make your way to a mystical temple using powers of astral projection.

name: In Wonderland
description: InWonderland is a healing casual puzzle game. Enjoy it leisurely.

name: Garganta
description: 'Garganta' is a 3D Platformer influenced by Tsutomu Nihei's works. Embody Servo, an android racing to neutralise a device that'll engulf the Universe in innumerable singularities. Encounter peculiar characters and unveil secret plots designed by an AI, maddened by horrors it was never meant to witness.

name: Self-Portrait
description: Self-Portrait is a short exploration game on a island filled with chickens in a dream. Enjoy observing the growth of chickens through four seasons, dancing chickens, and others in the coop.

name: HoneyFury
description: Base Construction and Strategic Card Management. You will construct and defend your base from enemy invasions. Employ clever layouts to enhance your base's defenses and acquire resources through card management. Get ready to embrace this strategic and thrilling honey-fueled frenzy!

name: Dead Underground
description: Dead Underground is a sci-fi survival game with RPG elements inspired by horror movies and the game Dead Space

name: Your Journey of Survival
description: Your Journey of Survival is an open world, sandbox game, mixing together the best elements of FPS, Survival, Tower Defense, and RPG games.

name: RunOut: Hothead Paws
description: RunOut is an online party platformer game for 2 to 6 players! Pick a cute animal character, race through unpredictable obstacle courses, collect coins, and be the first to grab the stuffed bear. Prepare for a fun, fast-paced mix of running, fighting, and partying!

name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire Plus
description: "Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire" the solitaire game with Klondike rules, is now available in a powered-up version! Play solitaire against 11 beautiful girls, from cool beauties to tsundere ladies!

name: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power
description: Roman Conquest: Rise to Power is a turn-based strategy game in which the player can feel like a great commander of the Roman Empire. Lead a legion and go with your army to recapture the occupied lands.

name: The Last Windmill
description: Embark on an epic journey in The Last Windmill an action-adventure game where you defend the last standing windmill against relentless hordes of monsters. Engage in intense battles, face increasingly challenging waves of enemies. Become the hero that saves humanity in this thrilling fight.

name: Making people to Fight Qin
description: "Making people to Fight Qin" is a set of three fire + tower defense + strategy and other gameplay of the individual sketch, you can build a variety of Mohist wooden armor people, formed different team linups, these wooden armor people can evolve to different branches.

name: Puropu Defense Squad
description: Co-op action-tower-defense game where you defend your precious extractor against hordes of wacky humans. Build dozens of traps, turrets, items and use your hero’s abilities in 1-4 player campaigns, and against other players in unique PvP game modes!

name: Project ST
description: Jump into the madcap world of Project ST, a free online multiplayer party shooter stuffed with colorful characters, wacky weapons, massive robots, and fast-paced battles!

name: Spirit of Meda
description: Spirit of Meda is a Pixel Art Adventure game, set in a world open for exploration and self-discovery. You will play as a young Traveller with the freedom to explore the vast and beautiful world of Meda at your own pace.

name: Meowing Point
description: Point and meow. 3D hidden cat game. These creatures have been turned into stone. Find and save them all.

name: Terminal Error
description: Preyed upon by grotesque experiments, you must find a way out of the research centre alive in this first-person point-and-click horror game. However, to escape, you must first delve hopelessly deeper into the maddening corridors of the facility.

name: The Book Of Hiro
description: “The Book of Hero” is a 3D visual puzzle game where players solve challenges and puzzles using illusions and perspective to find the hidden key in the map. The game tells the story of a brave villager named Hero who was ordered to meet the king and encountered various challenges and puzzles.

name: Cannon Fotter
description: Cannon Fotter is a first person VR tower destruction game. Shoot yourself out of a cannon and destroy things with your body.

name: Starfall Invaders
description: Embark on a roguelike shooting game set in a mysterious world that combines 2D and 3D elements. Survive and escape from an unknown planet. Utilize enemy resources to enhance yourself, repair your damaged spaceship, and prepare for increasingly powerful and numerous enemy forces.

name: Forgenator
description: "Forgenator" is an item crafting game where players take on the role of a forge apprentice. With the guidance of a powerful wizard, players take on exciting challenges to craft powerful weapons, armor, and items.

name: The Owl, the Thief and the Strawberries
description: An adventure platformer focused on stealth and exploration.

name: Birnchen & Friends: Minor Confrontations
description: Visit Pear and Mr. Blue in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

name: Invincible Presents: Atom Eve
description:
Become Atom Eve and take control of your own path as one of the most powerful superheroes in the Invincible universe! Unravel a mystery and balance the dangers and responsibilities of being a superhero with the relatable challenges of everyday life.

Experience an original story with striking art directed by Rossi Gifford and creative direction by award-winning writer Jill Murray, and explore the life of Atom Eve in a world filled with beloved characters. Based on the comic book by Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, and Ryan Ottley.

name: Chester: Into The Darkness
description: After being thrown into the trash, Chester has to fight his way back home while learning to face the darker side of himself.

name: Nature
description: Nature is Calling. From the publishers of the award-winning Evolution series comes a new expandable game system: Nature, where players create and adapt species in an ecosystem that changes as they play. Expansions are easy to add on and combinable, making for endless new ecosystems to explore.

name: Flies Flies Flies
description: 6-episode visual novel. One day, Finn Flynn wakes up in the body of a housefly. Without the use of his voice, he'll have to enlist his prankster ex-boyfriend, and his dads, an insectophobic mad scientist and a punk rocker, to solve the mystery of his transformation, and maybe get his life back?

name: Madcus Show
description: Discover the mystery behind Marcus Circus, the world's first circus with infinite energy generated by a mysterious crystal. You will have to try to survive by hiding, exploring, and solving puzzles.

name: Soul Keeper
description: Soul Keeper! Story based platform game. Sometimes it will drive you crazy with its difficulty, but it will drag you along with its story. Overcome obstacles, pass levels and collect the story!

name: Junkyard Fury Breakout
description: Junkyard Fury is back, with a vehicular combat style game! Each vehicle has its own progression and story, and each environment has its own destructive mechanics. Breakout and destroy everything and everyone in your way!

name: Deja Vu: The Backrooms
description: Deja Vu: The Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op exploration game set in procedurally generated levels. Traverse diverse scenarios, with unique entry points, entities and levels, as you aim to reach the end of each journey.

name: Swollen to Bursting Until I am Disappearing on Purpose
description: "Swollen to Bursting" is a weirdo RPG in which something is very wrong. A flying saucer has crash landed in town, but it's Thursday so you have to go to work at the post office.

name: Bushido Saga: Nightmare of the Samurai
description: Embrace the way of Bushido! Prepare for an Action-packed Adventure RPG game, as you step into the shoes of Oishi, an honorable Samurai. Engage in thrilling dynamic combat, embark on a gripping Saga, vanquish the forces of darkness, and uncover a sinister plot against Lord Asano.

name: The Armardisp
description: A physics-puzzler in which you drive around a little tank and knock down buildings from afar.

name: Little Doll Queen
description: Gensokyo suddenly plunged into a huge miasma of toxic fog, and the lands are now gloomy and lifeless. The source of these strange phenomena is the Nameless Hill, a forgotten land of sin. It's a danmaku experience full of poisons and suffocation. That means, this is a shooting game.

name: Defendron
description: Defendron is an epic, acion-packed, cyberpunk/futuristic themed tower defense with unique twist on upgrade path. Place towers, fend of huge enemy waves and emerge victorious!

name: Hidden Nightmares
description: Hidden Nightmares is a horror experience set inside the endless nightmares of a psychiatric patient. Experience the horrors generated by the human mind and wonder if you will ever wake up again.

name: Island
description: Cartoon 3D RPG Board Game, gathering, fighting monsters, exploring and solving puzzles, this world gathers characters from different eras to explore together and defeat the final Boss.

name: Valor & Victory: Kursk
description: In an effort to reverse their fortunes in Russia, the Germans committed their best forces to the Battle of Kursk. However, they were met with an unyielding Russian defense.

name: MGP Manager
description: MGP Manager is a Motogp themed management simulation. Take control of a GP team, and sign riders & staff and upgrade machines to try to win the riders and teams championship.

name: Match It Sexy
description: Embark on a captivating gem-matching adventure! Win the hearts of three charming ladies through strategic gameplay. Unlock stunning animations as rewards. Enjoy High Quality renders and animations.

name: Heart.HalfHalf
description: This game is a casual strategy game that requires players to overcome multiple challenges and connect with beautiful girls' hearts. Players need to operate the two sides of the heart and guide them to reach the destination at the same time, in order to win the heart of the girl.

name: Repair This!
description: A cell phone repair shop simulator with a first-person view, with the ability to spy on customers through gaining access to phones.

name: Suborbital
description: A sci-fi survival game with a twist. Set in a suborbit of a black hole, collect materials and scavenge in orer to repair your damaged ship. However, time is not on your side.

name: Labyrinth
description: The aMAZEing Labyrinth now with a completely new look and at long last for PC: for more than 35 years, the simple and unique gameplay of the board game has inspired more than 20 million people worldwide.

name: Shop Is Done
description: Shop Is Done — Story-driven 3D Tactics-Horror game with microgames. Move employees from task to task, satisfy customers, and follow the rules of the capricious clown puppet manager. Stay out of debt! Or face eternity as a lifeless puppet.

name: Ardem
description: Prepare for an immersive open-world survival experience. Scavenge, collect resources, craft tools and build your own shelter to overcome the challenges of survival in this harsh environment.

name: Vault of Power
description: Unleash your tactical prowess in 'Vault of Power', a roguelike auto-battler that plunges you into a treacherous dungeon. Draft from 60 unique skills and combine them to obtain class bonuses. Master the art of tactics, make unique builds, and become the supreme champion of the Vault.

name: Ewe Shall Not Pass
description: Ewe Shall Not Pass is a cozy farming action-roguelike adventure. Play as Shmandalf the wizard and herd your sheep through lands unknown, fighting off hordes of enemies with magic while upgrading your spells and growing your flock.

name: King of the Bridge
description: Face off against the bridge troll in his bizarre game of chess! Decrypt, Twist and Enforce the rules as your devious opponent attempts to break them in King of the Bridge!

name: Dustland
description: Dustland is a significantly new look on survival. It's a shooter where escapes, looting, and battles are just a veil hiding the world's mysteries. It's a captivating adventure from a dozen seasons, where uncovering the truth will change everything. Only a few will be able to reach the real answers…

name: Solitaire Quest: Garden Story
description: Join the captivating journey of Solitaire Quest: Garden Story and watch the garden bloom under your care. Solve solitaire puzzles, restore the garden's beauty, and uncover the secrets that await. Play now and immerse yourself in the world of solitaire delight!

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes
description: Explore the beautiful areas surrounding the Great Lakes of America!

name: Sayonara NightCap
description: Sin descripción

name: G-ump
description: Do you have what it takes to complete the level and make it to the end, jumping and completing different obstacles? It's simple, you have to double jump to be able to complete all the parkour, good luck jumper

name: Save City R
description: Introducing "Save City R" – an adrenaline-pumping game where you take on the role of a courageous team of tank fighters on a mission to liberate the сity of R from the grips of the notorious criminal organization known as "Shai Guu".

name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk FPS
description: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk FPS is a brutal, funny, bloody FPS game with an advanced gore system. Featuring 15 beautiful levels, a variety of weapons and a deeply engaging story that follows the journey of a young man and his friend tackling on a criminal underground to give his AI wife a real body.

name: A Dino Date
description: A game where you play as a velociraptor finding love. You are expected to craft, harvest, and create items using a variety of methods. Players must have a keen eye and be willing to monitor stats such as their health and energy - finding love is hard work!

name: Bloodthief
description: Bloodthief is an ultra-fast melee dungeon-runner where you use momentum to parkour through hazardous dungeons and brutally slash through enemies. Speed-run through medieval dungeons and castles and learn what dark secrets lie beneath the surface.

name: Ablaze
description: Experience a delightful, full-of-action, 2-player local co-op adventure of Ablaze, where you'll throw and activate objects to solve puzzles, tumble over obstacles to save adorable sheep and take down Scorch, the troublemaking fire spirit.

name: Dumbriel: Magnificent Adventure in Hell
description: Embark on an epic journey through Dante's 9 circles of hell as clumsy angel Dumbriel, whose mission is to reclaim the souls you lost. Explore angelic and infernal skills, collect shards, craft elixirs, and battle formidable creatures in this Metroidvania-style action adventure.

name: Goblins Please
description: The dark lord has tasked you to decide which heroes pass and which heroes do not. There are becoming too many papers and to top it off the camp with the other goblins will not last long without you. Decide who passes through during the day and manage the camp at night.

name: Crusaders Arena
description: Embark on an epic journey in Crusaders Arena, a multiplayer battleground where you mold your hero with unique loadouts and abilities. Engage in intense game modes, or perfect your skills in the practice range. Lead your team to glory, and dominate the battlefield in this action-packed crusade!

name: HoneySun
description: HoneySun is a CASUAL FARMING and DATING SIMULATOR. Grow crops, fall in love with numerous amazing characters, and explore unique game mechanics in a vibrant SANDBOX OPEN WORLD!

name: Answer Campus
description: A visual novel that takes you on a journey through a college campus to explore challenging scenarios around identity markers such as race, gender, sexuality, ableism, and more.

name: Rock Star Life Simulator
description: Rock Star Life Simulator is an extensive fame simulation game. Start this adventure by playing the guitar on the street, form your own band. Protect the fame, money, and charisma you earned with the right decisions and become a world star!

name: SCP: Josie
description: SCP: Josie is a game about a cat that is not all there, literally. Set in the expansive and collaboratively-created SCP universe, you play as an anomalous cat named Josie, or her more official designation: SCP-529.

name: Cocktail Magic
description: A human drama novel game set in a bar with the theme of "companion". Enjoy the "Speak Easy" atmosphere that mixes the liveliness of a bar with the stylishness of a bar.

name: Dark Desire Mute 6
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Bonfire Kingdom
description: Bonfire Kingdom is a cosy city builder mixed with RPG elements in a dark medieval fantasy world - like a hauntingly beautiful German fairy tale. Superior enemies are creeping out of the darkness. Protect your village by leading your band of loyal knights into battle.

name: Human Wall Simulator
description: All is about humans forming a wall, and breaking it! Gather your people and stand hand in hand. Hold up against rushing enemy. Explore wall scenarios and watch the humans fight in a real-time physics simulation playground.

name: Dead End Mission
description: The humans fled for their life! Now only aliens remain in the city. Your name is Mark, a professional marksman. You have one mission, to kill the alien Queen! Your helicopter buddy will provide you with supplies during the mission. But this will not be easy...

name: Unending
description: A roguelite-puzzle anthology.

name: Infection X
description: Join the viral adventure in this arcade-style game. Play as a virus, infect cells, defeat antibodies, and solve puzzles to collect RNA points. Navigate through lung, cell, and nuclear challenges, facing unique enemies and a thrilling boss battle. Get ready for a contagious gaming experience!

name: APlaceDominatedByHoles
description: Turn-based role-playing game to help the protagonist find the truth

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Variety Pack 9
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: In The Ruined Courtyard
description: Text adventure games. The story happened in the British Isles in the 16th century. Players will experience the storyline from the perspectives of Brand and Lev, exploring personal stories in 16th century British society.

name: Withering Flowers
description: In a world of magic, Shira embarks on a journey to find a cure for her sick girlfriend, facing her enigmatic teacher and her fiery sister. With the aid of a fearful friend and a bold rival, she seeks answers and a chance to mend their bond after breaking up.

name: Cursed Fables: A Voice to Die For - Collector's Edition
description: Marianna, the sea witch, is investigating a mind-control mystery, but she soon discovers that she may know the culprit personally!

name: LuckLand
description: LuckLand is a strategy game that combines elements such as slot machines, card building, and Roguelike. To achieve ultimate victory, all you need to do is rotate the chessboard. This game does not include any real world currency gambling or micro trading.

name: I'm Just a Slime
description: A dragon has moved in on a nearby mountain, causing havok in the surrounding ecosystems. A slime is chosen to go on a journey to confront the dragon in order to save their home. But will they be successful? After all, they are just a slime.

name: Sanguine
description: Sanguine tells the story of Yona, a cursed warrior in her quest for revenge a she battles her way through a dry medieval world filled with blood powered machine.

name: Cozy Space
description: "Cozy Space" is a relaxing home decoration game with true-to-life models and rooms. Enjoy a leisurely gaming experience and easily create cozy spaces. It cleverly blends music elements, allowing you to be a composer, interior designer, or simply relax without specific tasks!

name: Terre Scramble!
description: Terre is a merchant doing business in the city, and in order to earn more money, she often ventures into the labyrinth. However, the labyrinth is fraught with danger...

name: Myth of the Moirai
description: Fight off the horde and collect loot as you make your way through a dynamically created world and find a way to end the scourge of evil in this land.

name: Jet Soccer
description: Jet Soccer delivers thrilling, physics-based soccer matches. Steer your aircraft, perform swift maneuvers, and score epic goals in minimalist, yet vivid arenas! Enjoy competitive fun with friends locally or online.

name: Coco
description: This is a single player exploration and decryption type of game, the player controls the young magician in the map to find the exit, the way may have to explore a variety of props, acquire a variety of skills, in order to successfully find the exit.

name: Top Racer Collection
description: The Top Racer Collection showcases the renowned 16-bit racing game franchise, featuring beloved titles such as Top Racer, Top Racer 2, and Top Racer 3000, along with exciting new and exclusive content.

name: Goliath Depot
description: Goliath Depot is a door-slamming 2D arcade platformer taken straight from the early 80's. Close all doors, kick the enemies and rack up a high score in 4 different worlds. Are you good enough to lift the curse of the Goliath Depot?

name: Room In Dream
description: A peaceful, and chill casual puzzle game. Discover, collect, and assemble furniture to decorate your little cozy room and surrounding environment in the peaceful land, feeling the white noise of the nature, time flow and weather change.

name: Yarashii Hotel
description: Welcome to Yarashii Hotel, a place where all your dreams will become real! Explore hundreds of procedurally generated rooms while you meet all kind of entities eager to satisfy all of your desires! But beware! Some of them will try to catch you and make you stay in the hotel forever...

name: Monarchy
description: A 2D strategy game about a young heir who must defend the crown from those who want to take it.

name: The Severn Rising 2222
description: A graphic adventure set 200 years in the future in the flooded city of Worcester. Who were the humans? Why did they have to leave? Where are they now? Guide a swan and a duck as they attempt to find out.

name: Hentai Aim Puzzle
description: Relax and enjoy hentais while shooting puzzles!

name: Hook Adventure
description: Every 200 years the balance support mechanism is destroyed, the crystals that help it work are scattered around the world, and only you can collect them all! Use hook to move between the flying islands and collect all the crystals!

name: XR22-Seaguard
description: XR22-Seaguard is a PC and VR game that reimagines the classic grid-based game of Battleship. This immersive PC and VR game puts you in the heart of a dynamic 3D industrial environment, where you'll strategically place and sink ships using state-of-the-art weapons and defenses.

name: Astro Heist
description: Launch into the exhilarating world of Astro Heist, an asymmetric PVP Screen vs. VR game of cunning and infiltration set within bustling space outposts. Blend into the environment and sneak through challenging missions, but beware, the VR watcher is vigilant and one false move could give you away!

name: For the Ghosts
description: Sin descripción

name: Darker Skies: Remastered for PC
description: Darker Skies comes fully remastered to PC. Incorporating new graphical features and gameplay enhancements for the definitive way to play Darker Skies. Survival Horror set after the War of the Worlds.

name: Rotting Rumble: Zombie Football
description: Run to the end zone in this 3D platformer as you're chased by hordes of zombies! Collect weapons and items to fight back against the undead. Can you outrun the zombie horde?

name: VenusBlood Gaia International
description: Embark on the impossible quest to rescue the decaying world of Palastra in this dungeon defense SRPG, interwoven with a story of epic proportions!

name: Human Farm: Pratice Section
description: Human Farm - Pratice Section is a "milking-specialized exploration escape game" developed by Tokkuri Kurage! Find a way to escape from this farm where women are treated like cows!

name: Zombie Virus Ukraine 2022
description: Zombie virus Ukraine 2022 is a game in which our main character is faced with the fact that massively armed, infected people began to enter Ukraine across the border, as a result, chaos, cruelty, and massacres formed around.

name: Forgotten Lectures: Fall of a Dynasty - The Beginning
description: Humanity went out to the stars and conquered a significant portion of the known galaxy. While technology advanced society did not necessarily. Greed, the struggle for power and influence is stronger than ever before and while besieged from outside forces there’s no lack of internal strife.

name: Adventure Field Remake
description: A long time ago, in the fabled kingdom of Sarook, a young boy was witness to words of light filling his dreams. An evil aura had consumed and poisoned the Sarook King's soul, and the corruption swayed him to unleash an army of monsters upon his own kingdom. Relive the very start of the legend...

name: Assault Shell 2
description: A high-risk, high reward shoot em up as you power yourself and your enemies up to bring utter chaos to the battlefield!

name: Deep Secret
description: This is a casual puzzle match-3 game. Players need to use the mouse to select two unobstructed squares, and if they are the same, they will be eliminated. After success, you can advance the plot and story development of the two protagonists!

name: ROFL
description: The ultimate mash-up of Reversed Bullet Hell and Tower Defense! Rage of Fluffy Looters is a game where you play as a cat and must fight off hordes of monsters with your towers. Protect your fur and unleash your furious rage!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario: "Battle of Tetorigawa"
description: The dragon of Echigo makes his move to defeat Nobunaga.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 5
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters. Ruby and Hunter just returned home from a date when they catch their naughty maid getting it on with her newest boyfriend on their terrace. They seduce the hot couple into letting them join the fun.

name: The Way
description: "The Way" is sci-fi third or first person physics based real-time action adventure game with character customization.

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - The Dragon's Gambit
description: Brace yourself for 15 thrilling missions and find the valuable high-tier weapon cache in every mission. Introducing the Longbow fire-support 'Mech. Unlock Izanagi Warriors Variants as exclusive campaign rewards! New Instant Action Team Combat Mode, Garrisoned and Free For All.

name: Mini Settlers
description: Mini Settlers is a minimalistic city builder! Settle islands, construct cities, and design efficient logistic networks to fulfill your buildings' needs and fuel population growth to adventure into new worlds.

name: Gassy Choose Your Own Adventure Weirdo
description: you play some guy from the moon who farts a lot and his arch-rival is some guy just called Nerdy Guy who makes evil robots to conquer the world or something.

name: Puppetmaster
description: Discover a metroidvania with a huge world, platform-fighter dynamic combat, smart bosses, deep lore, and original music, all made by two brothers.

name: Shakunetsu no Miko Shizune
description: Shizune Ayatsuji was born in a prestigious priestess family and raised to become an Exorcist. One day, she confronted a powerful Fiend. Shizune did not stand a chance, but her mother Kaori, also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her. Shizune made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.

name: Error143 DLC
description: Following Micah's arrival to your room, you go on dates! Play his specially curated game for you until morning rise, go star gazing together, and howl at the moon! Have some late night talks and just...enjoy each other's presence.

name: Cave of Evil
description: Cave of Evil is a horror game in which a desperate father becomes obsessed with recovering his daughter who died in an accident through a strange ritual.

name: Icarus: New Frontiers
description: New Frontiers expands Icarus with a whole new map with hazardous environments, alien life and weather. Advance the story with six new chained narrative missions that delve into the mysteries of this alien planet. Extend your experience with 100+ new items to craft, collect, build, deploy and use.

name: Vampire Mansion
description: Explore the mansion, find a way to fight the vampires, find the key, and escape the mansion.

name: Gravity League
description:
In a world where gravity is no longer a limitation, the Gravity League has become the ultimate test of skill and endurance for athletes from all corners of the galaxy.

The rules are simple: 2 players, 1 ball, zero gravity - the first player to get 11 goals wins!

name: Exorcism
description: "Exorcism" is a first-person parkour-style puzzle + horror game. Brave the fog-shrouded town, exorcise the spirits, unravel the mysteries, and save the town!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 8
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: The House
description: You are an 18-year-old Spanish boy called Antonio who one day went shopping, and when he returned home he noticed things that were somewhat strange...

name: Flying Shark
description: Experience Toaplan's arcade shooter Flying Shark (AKA Sky Shark) on PC with the latest quality-of-life features. Ride through the skies as they burn in a rain of armor-piercing bullets! You have been chosen for the mission. Because you are the best pilot there is!

name: Goodbye Eternity
description:
Goodbye Eternity is a point-and-click, adventure game with elements of visual novel and dating sim.

You have the possibility to have several paths when you interact with people, especially with women, depending on your actions and answers, the story will be different.

name: Uprising
description: Grab your bat, lock your shields and light up that molotov: it’s time to take to the streets! Uprising is a brutal modern day riot simulator, where you fight either as police or protestors in a frenzied multiplayer melee/shooter mash-up.

name: Under the bed
description: Under the Bed is a spine-chilling horror game that will take you on a nightmarish journey into the depths of fear.

name: Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania
description:
Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania is a new match 3 game with talking cat Emma as the main character, who will guide you through the levels and watch you make progress. If you are a fan of fruit splash games, you will certainly have fun with this one. Download Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania matching game and enjoy this fruit blast adventure!
There hardly is a person who once wasn't addicted to a certain match 3 game.

name: Jumpy Clash
description:
Jumpy Clash is an intense action packed one touch game with non-stop explosive action.
Clash through geometry hurdles at great pace. You will be moving very fast and have to Colour Switch quickly to go further. Tap the jumpy ball through obstacles and be very careful. To cross the obstacle the color of ball should be the same as the color of obstacle. If the colors don’t match and you try to cross, you’ll have to start all over again. So keep an eye on the color patterns and switch color if you have to.
Dive into this simple one touch controls game to top the leaderboards.

name: Jungle Munchers
description:
Battle jungle munchers to eat the most munchies in a series of gut-wrenching challenges.
Use weapons of mass digestion for a munching boost.

name: Savvy Fisher
description:
Enjoy the most epic of epic saga about Love, Wisdom and Fishing! Yet keep in mind that fishing is power... and fishing is addictive!
A story full of humor, addictive gameplay, beautiful and tasty colorful fishes, awesome loving wife and insanely evil Rainbow Moray. An entertaining modern take on match-three puzzle genre.

name: Golfstacle! Minigolf
description:
This is minigolf the way it's meant to be played!
Forget about the wacky clown heads and spinning windmills. This is the pure sport in it's truest fashion!

name: Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines
description:
Introducing Rocket Car: Ultimate Ball League Machines — the perfect blend of fast cars and thrilling soccer action!
Choose from a variety of stylish vehicles, each with its own unique abilities. Whether you prefer speedy sports cars or powerful machines, there's a ride for everyone in Rocket Car.

name: Retro Mystery Club Vol.1: The Ise-Shima Case
description: This classic-style mystery adventure game, inspired by the Famicom Detective Club series and illustrated by Famitsu's legend Kiyokazu Arai, will take you on a suspenseful journey through the beautiful landscapes of Ise-Shima.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Light hurt his eyes, use that to your advantage and keep him away. Learn the different points where the creature can enter to be prepared. Sound will give you clues to the creature's arrival. Keep your flashlight charged up. Every night the creature will try new ways to trap you.

name: Aery: Flow of Time
description: Enjoy a combat-free journey through colorful worlds and search for the cure! Lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying.

name: Traxion 2
description: Welcome to Traxion 2! Again you take the role of a daring starship pilot, embarking on a series of break-neck missions into the caves of a dangerous alien planet. This time around, you can join forces with a second player, or challenge each other in deadly deathmatch mode!

name: Andromeda
description: In this casual sci-fi side scrolling space shooter, you are the last human and decide to make a final trip to the Andromeda galaxy before saying your final goodbye to the universe. Conquer enemies, experience the story, and find out what awaits you in Andromeda.

name: Blobbers
description: A community of blobfish have been displaced from their homes by a storm. Collect your friends and bring them home!

name: Gash
description: Gash is a hack-and-slash roguelike game. You play as a ronin seeking to become the strongest swordsman in the Sengoku era of Japan. Battle legendary foes to take on your challenge to become the greatest!

name: Corrupt
description: Survive in a dark and atmospheric action-platformer characterized by environments full of mystery and fearsome enemies.

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Free Edition
description: Enter the world of Granblue Fantasy at no cost with the Free Edition of Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising, which includes: 4 playable characters (Gran and 3 rotating characters), part 1 of the story, online matches and lobby access (including access to Grand Bruise Legends!). Some features are limited in the Free Edition.

name: Beckon the Hellspawn
description:
Survive against hordes of relentless creatures by using your arcane powers to defeat them. Gather their essence and use it to increase your magical prowess! Use the beacons lure them and defeat them, but be warned, the more time passes, the stronger they get.

Your mission? Survive until "It" arrives. When "it" arrives, destroy it.

name: Regulate
description:
A universe...
It's filled up with garbage asteroids.
Planets have spaceships to destroy them.
But they are not using attack ships. Nobody knows why.
And they need some objects. These objects can be found in neighbor planets.
But they are not going for taking them too!
This universe needs an organizator. Wonder who can make things right here...
Maybe you can?

name: The Elite of Mboa
description: Le Responsable is a satirical life sim game from Cameroonian developer Kiro'o Games. Set in the fictional "very very democratic republic of Mboa", this sendup of African politics puts players in the shoes of a very ordinary man stepping into his first week on the job in the General Ministry of His Excellency Mougabiang. Players make countless choices over the course of their careers, from whether to follow a corrupt or honest path in politics to where to spend their time and money at night, with many different branching story paths.

name: BetterSADX
description: BetterSADX is a modpack for the Steam release of Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut, which features various enhancements and features that have been added by members of the community.

name: Orbo's Odyssey
description: Orbo Stetson is just your average personal assistant. He files documents, he drafts up risk mitigation plans for new products, and he can launch himself like a .50 caliber bullet when prompted. On this fateful day, however, Orbo and his coworker Peeb find themselves in a bit of a predicament... The automatic door opener has been fried, and with the duo lacking a single arm between them, they are now trapped in their Boss's office. It's up to Orbo to scrounge up enough gear parts across 4 unique product portals to engineer a prosethetic arm so that he and Peeb may finally open the door and escape from this unsavory work environment...

name: El Viaje de Diciembre
description: Set of 6 levels with a consistent rustic theme, inspired by EARTH.wad, Fistful of Doom, Evilution and other 90's goodies. The project originated as a speedmapping challenge for me where I'd make the first two maps in a day each, the next two in 2 days each, and so on. I wanted to have 6 full maps originally, but I only managed to finish 4, excluding the thank you map and the secret map.

name: Eldritch Voyage
description: Eldritch Voyage is a new mossy jungle themed episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: I Cant Give You Any thing
description: I Cant Give You Any thing is a set of 27 (to be ~29) MBF21 speedmaps, mostly by me, primarily themed around usage of monocolor textures, HOMs, "ugly/distracting/disorienting" textures like FIREBLU, visual disorientation, perception fuckery, etc. All of my maps were made within ~30 minutes to 2 hours each, with the guest maps being more variable (4-6 hours in some cases). Gameplay-wise, maps are mostly slaughter-y, with some of them on the side of macroslaughter and others being much more compact. Inspirations for my maps vary wildly, but mostly take from music and other art that I like outside of Doom.

name: Pleasant Vibes from the Party Garage
description:
A glorious community project that takes advantage of boom features, 32in24-15_textures that are baked in and a wide variety of talent from 29 unique mappers from all over the globe!

Each map name was thought up by Clippy's wife and mappers got to pick which name to use in which to map with. This had unexpected and super creative results!

For the most part, maps are meant to be short and playtime is usually 10-15 mins each - get ready for a wild ride that should keep you entertained with unique map after unique map!

name: Sekhemti
description: A Boom compatible 6 maps journey through the valley of the Kings. Each map can be completed in 5-10 minutes (except Map 05 which is approximately 15 minutes long).

name: 10 Years of Doom
description: 10 Years of Doom was a mapping contest held from April 9 to May 3, 2021. The event was organized by Richard Frei (Tarnsman) to celebrate his 10th year anniversary in the Doom community. A total of 17 entries were accepted.

name: Boomer: Beyond Vanilla
description: Limit-removing Doom 2 WAD, focused on action, adventure and exploration, featuring a brand new MIDI soundtrack inspired by classic shooters' music.

name: Violetshift
description:
This is a collaborative set of 13 Boom-compatible (-cl9) levels made from and inspired by Stardate 20x7. Proto-slaughter, tight skirmishes, casual combat, and various puzzlery await, all splotched with purple for the eyes to feast on. This is a mix of short void vignettes and extensive gothic/cavernous menageries, so maybe there's something for everyone here.
This set is comparable to late Sunlust, Fractured Worlds, and its very inspiration. Difficulty settings have been taken into account, and we've done our best to make HNTR/HMP enjoyable experiences while still being somewhat challenging.

name: Headless Chicken
description: Headless Chicken is a delicious variety megawad in progress where Doomguy is continuously chased by chickens and other demons, too.

name: Arrokoth
description: Dark and Moody vanilla-compatible E1 replacement for The Ultimate Doom.

name: Limit Buffet
description: Limit Buffet is a 39-map limit-removing community megawad made of maps and songs which each adhere to their own strict limitations. Perhaps you’ve seen wads based on such mapping limitations: using only 100 linedefs, 64 vertices, or 30 monsters for example. Limit Buffet samples a variety of these ideas, some traditional, some zany. We’ve even got a full soundtrack in this spirit!

name: Thirty Monsters Challenge
description: The mission was simple: make a map with thirty monsters in it. In the end, sixty-four of them were made, for your personal enjoyment.

name: Wildwood: A Town Building Game
description: Wildwood is a city building strategy game that is all about expansion. Start from nothing. As you gather resources and progress through the Tech Tree you will unlock new technologies that will help you survive. To reach more valuable resources you will need to expand. Deploy a logistics network of Trains and Wagons to connect your settlement together. As you continue to gather, build, expand, and connect you will be able to turn your surviving settlement into a thriving town.

name: Vae Victus
description: A 7 level "episode" for Doom 2 utilizing new textures and music. For fans of Deus Vult and Alien Vendetta. There are only two difficulty settings: Normal (easy and medium) and hard.The most noticable areas of difficulty change is in key areas, such as replacing an archville with a baron of hell (for example). Normal difficulty is a toned down version while Ultra Violence is what makes VV fun. My advice is to play it on UV, and if it proves too much, play it on normal. However, Map06 in particular is quite hard on UV.

name: Quarantine Breach
description: A single map replacement for UDoom, made during a spark of inspiration in using the "containment area" theme.

name: Demonic Deviation
description: This wad contains 11 maps replacing Maps01-11, these are pretty much tech based themed though they can be separated by the traditional map07 intermission screen, the first six are more earth base style and revolve around a power facility, the final five are more military base style. There will be a lot of familiairty from some past works of mine (Maps 07 and 10) or indeed other peoples works from the past (Map04 and perhaps 11). This wad is limit removing (complevel 2)

name: ConC.E.R.Ned
description: 3 episode wad for ultimate doom with the usual tech/hell tech/hell setup with a few exceptions from time to time. This is an expansion from my cbspeed.wad I realeased last August, so the first episode is an updated version of cbspeed with hopefully improved gameplay and layout flow. Episodes 2 and 3 were solely built from scratch. The wad is designed to hopefully give a varied and at times challenging gameplay experience.

name: Winter Memories
description: After the unforgettable summer memories you’ve made half a year ago, Yui, Rio, and Miyuki are back. With the change of seasons and the cold falling snow, a new page to your story is about to begin.

name: What?!
description: What?! is a single-player mystery game that focuses on its compact story and unconventional solutions. Players will take on the role of Pat Irvin, a ditzy private investigator struggling to maintain his family business.

name: Hot Beaver Camp
description: Enter a world of horror and suspense, in this RPG action game, fight to survive, rescue and escape alive from a camp in the middle of the forest.

name: Hues of Hope: A Painter's Tale
description: Hues of Hope is a colorful adventure where you play as a painter on a mission to recolor the world using elemental magic. Solve puzzles, explore Chromacia, and prepare for thrilling encounters with evil that can only be defeated by using colors and their corresponding elements to restore harmony.

name: Godsvivors
description: Prepare for epic battles between gods and Hades in this top-down action roguelite! Choose your deity, unleash powerful combos, and fight against underworld enemies. Feel the adrenaline for 15 minutes and restore order in the underworld. Get it now!

name: Turret Rampage
description: Defend humanity from underground monsters as the last standing turret! Force burrowers out of the ground with an artificial earthquake, capture elusive ghosts with silver shackles, and shatter alien bugs into pieces using powerful rockets!

name: Bring The Chickens Home
description: Find your lost chickens and bring em home in this casual action isometric 3d platformer. Compete against other players best times around the world. Work and fight together in local co-op. Save as many chickens and survive in endless mode.

name: Swordcar
description: Swordcar is an automotive Car-achter action game with a healthy serving of gore. Slash and slice at 100 MPH and bathe in the blood of the mysterious busy corp.

name: Last Round
description: Focus... Aim... Draw!

name: Roll & Ball
description: Roll & Ball is an American Football board game where you can call plays and control a playmaker. Play with dice to control the balance of a play or without to determine the right play.

name: Cats in Heat: Convenience Coworkers
description: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 catgirls who work under you in a small grocery store - Enjoy comedy and animated sex scenes!

name: Void Survivors
description: Void Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelike game where you have to survive relentless hordes of monsters for 20 minutes!

name: Cody's Nightmare
description: Cody's Nightmare is a beautiful 2D pixel art game about a little boy named Cody who is stuck in his nightmare! His only way out is to conquer his fears! But don't worry, he won’t be alone. He will get help from his friends inspired by his favorite toys, comics, and video games.

name: Mechanic 8230: Mission Citytone
description: Mechanic 8230: Episode 2 is the continuation of the point-and-click adventure of Vigo and his robotic friend RO-2, as they uncover the secrets of the space station Сitytone this time.

name: Manny's
description: A starving castaway on a deserted island discovers that a fast food restaurant appears once the sun goes down. As if beckoning him inside in his most desperate hour of need, this stranded soul will have to work for his meal...and for his life!

name: Zombie Sanctuary: Arelia
description: This is a fun 3D mowing magic battle game. Very decompression, press a few keys, move the mouse can feel a pleasant game experience.

name: The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary
description: Adam wakes up trapped in his apartment building, where darkness and strange visions abound. To unravel the mystery and escape, he must find missing diary pages, embarking on a heart-pumping First Person Visual Novel Adventure in 'The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary.

name: Squab
description: Squab is a young pigeon who woke up in a cage, but his father Maximus had disappeared, leaving only a red cap behind. Find out how to save Maximus by overcoming unimaginable challenges in this thrilling and exciting adventure.

name: Cush's Amazin' Adventure!!
description: A monster living in a small town set on a journey to become a hero. Explore stages of typical fantasy world. Help this monster kill the demon king and become a saviour of the world. But if you don't want to... You have another choice.

name: Glixel
description: Each Entity has a role to play... A reason why it is created... Something weird is going on in the Core... maybe an opportunity to do what she was made for?

name: Twyla
description: You are a spaceship pilot involuntarily involved into some events whose income is unclear. You meet a beautiful stranger, an inhabitant of another civilization. You're taking her side and going to protect her in the circumstances.

name: Ecosphere
description: An apprentice engineer inherits an orb capable of controlling nature to prevent the advent of a world where humans and machines become one.

name: Tetris Bliss
description: Are you ready to challenge the block fun and explore the wonderful world of Meitu? Come experience this addictive Tetris game eliminate blocks, collect gift boxes, and uncover the secrets of Meitu!

name: RBM Studio's Gettysburg
description: A historical hexagonal turn-based strategy wargame using markers to represent units designed by the legendary Mark Herman. Throwback to the great hex-based wargames of the 70's and 80's. Solo and online multiplayer modes are supported.

name: Chemical Sort
description: Chemical Sort is a science-themed casual puzzle in which you unscramble various colored chemicals by sorting them into their own test tubes.

name: Black Powder Desolation
description: Fight your way past the law with up to 3 of your friends in a coop campaign containing a variety of distinct locations and gameplay rewarding teamplay and cooperation, or master a variety of weapon classes against other players in thrilling battles featuring up to 24 players.

name: Apocalypse: Zombie City
description: A third person shooter set in a zombie-infested city that, if left unresolved, will lead to the apocalyptic end of humanity.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Canada
description: Get ready to explore, learn, and be enchanted by the majestic landscapes of Canada.

name: Hyperons
description: The plan is to go into early access at the end of 2024. Because I'm working solo on the project and it's difficult to estimate some of the workload. It's my first project and I'm trying to give you a good gaming experience and a game that you enjoy playing.

name: Bunny Revenge
description: Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm where cuddly creatures and vibrant landscapes come to life. Join Coco on his unforgettable adventure and immerse yourself in a world where dreams and technology collide. Don’t miss out on the ultimate plushy adventure!

name: Eastern Front
description: Eastern Front is a semi realistic multiplayer game combining real time strategy and boots to the ground fps combat. Generals command their divisions and manage war industry while soldiers go to the battle with equipment given to them.

name: Square Word: Back to Work
description: Square Word is coming on Steam! Discover 100+ words spread in 4 chill themes! Handcrafted grids, hints, mini-objectives & more!

name: Etos
description: A Pacifist Immersive Sim set in an underground city. Be slippery, be stealthy or cause chaos as you evade, hack and disrupt your way to the surface in this intricately designed fps stealth experience, where getting spotted is half the fun

name: Creature Rumble
description: Creature Rumble is a turn based, single payer card game that allows you to collect 65+ unique creature cards. Create the best deck to defeat your foes and become the greatest rumble master of all time.
